275 bool SkillManager::ActivateSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
276  uint32_t skillID, int64_t activationObjectID, int64_t targetObjectID,
277  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
278 {
279  auto server = mServer.lock();
280  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
281  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
282  auto def = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
283  if (nullptr == def)
284  {
285  return 0;
286  }
287 
288  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
289  source->GetEntityID());
290 
291  uint8_t activationType = def->GetBasic()->GetActivationType();
292  bool instantExecution = activationType == 6;
293 
294  auto activated = source->GetActivatedAbility();
295  if(activated && !instantExecution)
296  {
297  // Cancel existing first
298  CancelSkill(source, activated->GetActivationID());
299  }
300 
301  auto cast = def->GetCast();
302  auto activatedTime = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
303 
304  activated = std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>(
305  new objects::ActivatedAbility);
306  activated->SetSkillID(skillID);
307  activated->SetSourceEntity(source);
308  activated->SetActivationObjectID(activationObjectID);
309  activated->SetTargetObjectID(targetObjectID);
310  activated->SetActivationTime(activatedTime);
311 
312  if(instantExecution)
313  {
314  // Instant activations are technically not activated
315  activated->SetActivationID(-1);
316  }
317  else
318  {
319  activated->SetActivationID(source->GetNextActivatedAbilityID());
320  }
321 
322  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, nullptr, client);
323  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
324 
325  // Stack adjust is affected by 2 sources if not an item skill or just
326  // explicit item including adjustments if it is an item skill
327  uint8_t maxStacks = (uint8_t)(def->GetCast()->GetBasic()->GetUseCount() +
328  tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
329  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_ITEM_STACK_ADJUST, calcState) +
330  (!pSkill->IsItemSkill ? tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
331  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_STACK_ADJUST, calcState) : 0));
332  activated->SetMaxUseCount(maxStacks);
333 
334  // If the skill needs to charge, see if any time adjustments exist.
335  // This will never reduce to 0% time so storing the context is not
336  // necessary.
337  uint32_t defaultChargeTime = cast->GetBasic()->GetChargeTime();
338  uint32_t chargeTime = defaultChargeTime;
339  if(chargeTime > 0)
340  {
341  int16_t chargeAdjust = source->GetCorrectValue(
342  CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME, calcState);
343  if(chargeAdjust != 100)
344  {
345  chargeTime = (uint32_t)ceill(chargeTime *
346  (chargeAdjust * 0.01));
347  }
348  }
349 
350  // Charge time is in milliseconds, convert to microseconds
351  auto chargedTime = activatedTime + (chargeTime * 1000);
352 
353  activated->SetChargedTime(chargedTime);
354 
355  // If the skill is not an instantExecution, activate it and calculate
356  // movement speed
357  if(!instantExecution)
358  {
359  source->SetActivatedAbility(activated);
360 
361  float chargeSpeed = 0.f, chargeCompleteSpeed = 0.f;
362 
363  // Send movement speed based off skill action type
364  switch(def->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
365  {
366  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SPIN:
367  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RAPID:
368  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::COUNTER:
369  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE:
370  // No movement during or after
371  break;
372  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SHOT:
373  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
374  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
375  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SUPPORT:
376  // Move after only
377  chargeCompleteSpeed = source->GetMovementSpeed();
378  break;
379  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
380  // Move during and after charge (1/2 normal speed)
381  chargeSpeed = chargeCompleteSpeed = (source->GetMovementSpeed() *
382  0.5f);
383  break;
384  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
385  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
386  default:
387  // Move during and after charge (normal speed)
388  chargeSpeed = chargeCompleteSpeed = source->GetMovementSpeed();
389  break;
390  }
391 
392  activated->SetChargeMoveSpeed(chargeSpeed);
393  activated->SetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed(chargeCompleteSpeed);
394 
395  uint16_t functionID = def->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
396  if(functionID &&
397  mSkillFunctions.find(functionID) != mSkillFunctions.end())
398  {
399  // Set special activation and let the respective skill handle it
400  source->SetSpecialActivations(activated->GetActivationID(),
401  activated);
402  }
403 
404  SendActivateSkill(activated);
405  }
406 
407  bool executeNow = activationType == 6 || (defaultChargeTime == 0 &&
408  (activationType == 3 || activationType == 4));
409  if(executeNow)
410  {
411  if(!ExecuteSkill(source, activated, client, ctx))
412  {
413  return false;
414  }
415  }
416  else
417  {
418  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_CHARGING, chargedTime);
419  }
420 
421  return true;
422 }
423 
424 bool SkillManager::ExecuteSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
425  int8_t activationID, int64_t targetObjectID, std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
426 {
427  auto client = mServer.lock()->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
428  source->GetEntityID());
429 
430  bool success = true;
431 
432  auto activated = GetActivation(source, activationID);
433  if(!activated)
434  {
435  success = false;
436  }
437  else
438  {
439  activated->SetTargetObjectID(targetObjectID);
440  }
441 
442  if(success && !ExecuteSkill(source, activated, client, ctx))
443  {
444  success = false;
445  }
446 
447  return success;
448 }
449 
450 bool SkillManager::ExecuteSkill(std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
451  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
452  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
453  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
454 {
455  auto server = mServer.lock();
456  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
457  auto skillID = activated->GetSkillID();
458  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
459 
460  if(nullptr == skillData)
461  {
462  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unknown skill ID encountered: %1\n")
463  .Arg(skillID));
464  SendFailure(activated, client);
465  return false;
466  }
467 
468  uint16_t functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
469  uint8_t skillCategory = skillData->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory();
470 
471  if(skillCategory == 0)
472  {
473  SendFailure(activated, client);
474  return false;
475  }
476 
477  // Check targets
478  if(skillData->GetTarget()->GetType() == objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_ALLY)
479  {
480  auto damageFormula = skillData->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula();
481  bool isRevive = damageFormula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL
482  || damageFormula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC
483  || damageFormula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT;
484 
485  // If the target is a character and they have not accepted revival, stop here
486  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
487  auto targetClientState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(targetEntityID);
488  if(isRevive && (!targetClientState ||
489  (!targetClientState->GetAcceptRevival() &&
490  targetClientState->GetCharacterState()->GetEntityID() == targetEntityID)))
491  {
492  SendFailure(activated, client,
493  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
494  return false;
495  }
496  }
497 
498  // Verify the target now
499  auto targetType = skillData->GetTarget()->GetType();
500  if(targetType != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE &&
501  targetType != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OBJECT)
502  {
503  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
504 
505  if(targetEntityID <= 0)
506  {
507  //No target
508  SendFailure(activated, client,
509  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
510  return false;
511  }
512 
513  auto zone = source->GetZone();
514  if(nullptr == zone)
515  {
516  LOG_ERROR("Skill activation attempted outside of a zone.\n");
517  SendFailure(activated, client,
518  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
519  return false;
520  }
521 
522  auto targetEntity = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
523  if(nullptr == targetEntity || !targetEntity->Ready())
524  {
525  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Invalid target ID encountered: %1\n")
526  .Arg(targetEntityID));
527  SendFailure(activated, client,
528  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
529  return false;
530  }
531 
532  bool targetAlive = targetEntity->IsAlive();
533  bool allies = targetEntity->GetFaction() == source->GetFaction();
534  auto targetEntityType = targetEntity->GetEntityType();
535  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(source->GetEntityID());
536  auto targetState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(targetEntity->GetEntityID());
537 
538  // If using a (primary) talk skill on an entity with 100% talk resist
539  // stop the skill
540  switch(skillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
541  {
542  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
543  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
544  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
545  if(targetEntityType == objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::ENEMY)
546  {
547  auto enemyState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(targetEntity);
548  auto enemy = enemyState ? enemyState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
549  auto spawn = enemy ? enemy->GetSpawnSource() : nullptr;
550  if(!spawn || spawn->GetTalkResist() >= 100)
551  {
552  SendFailure(activated, client,
553  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_INVALID);
554  return false;
555  }
556 
557  auto cs = targetEntity->GetCoreStats();
558  if(cs && cs->GetLevel() > source->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel())
559  {
560  SendFailure(activated, client,
561  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_LEVEL);
562  return false;
563  }
564  }
565  break;
566  default:
567  break;
568  }
569 
570  bool targetInvalid = false;
571  switch(targetType)
572  {
573  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY:
574  targetInvalid = !allies || !targetAlive;
575  break;
576  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_ALLY:
577  targetInvalid = !allies || targetAlive;
578  break;
579  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTNER:
580  targetInvalid = !sourceState || sourceState->GetCharacterState() != source ||
581  sourceState->GetDemonState() != targetEntity || !targetAlive;
582  break;
583  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTY:
584  targetInvalid = !sourceState || !targetState || (sourceState->GetPartyID() &&
585  sourceState->GetPartyID() != targetState->GetPartyID()) ||
586  (!sourceState->GetPartyID() && sourceState != targetState)|| !targetAlive;
587  break;
588  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ENEMY:
589  targetInvalid = allies || !targetAlive;
590  break;
591  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_PARTNER:
592  targetInvalid = !sourceState || sourceState->GetCharacterState() != source ||
593  sourceState->GetDemonState() != targetEntity || targetAlive;
594  break;
595  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_PLAYER:
596  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
597  sourceState == targetState || !allies || !targetAlive;
598  break;
599  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_DEMON:
600  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON ||
601  (sourceState && sourceState->GetDemonState() != targetEntity) || !allies ||
602  !targetAlive;
603  break;
604  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_PLAYER:
605  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
606  !allies || !targetAlive;
607  break;
608  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_DEMON:
609  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON ||
610  !allies || !targetAlive;
611  break;
612  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PLAYER:
613  targetInvalid = !sourceState || sourceState->GetCharacterState() != targetEntity;
614  break;
615  default:
616  break;
617  }
618 
619  if(targetInvalid)
620  {
621  SendFailure(activated, client, (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
622  return false;
623  }
624 
625  activated->SetEntityTargeted(true);
626  }
627 
628  // Make sure we have an execution context
629  if(!ctx)
630  {
631  ctx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
632  }
633 
634  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx, client);
635  pSkill->SourceExecutionState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
636 
637  // Check costs and pay costs (skip for switch deactivation)
638  int32_t hpCost = 0, mpCost = 0;
639  uint16_t bulletCost = 0;
640  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> itemCosts;
641  if(!ctx->FreeCast && (skillCategory == 1 || (skillCategory == 2 &&
642  !source->ActiveSwitchSkillsContains(skillID))))
643  {
644  uint32_t hpCostPercent = 0, mpCostPercent = 0;
645  if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUMMON_DEMON)
646  {
647  if(client)
648  {
649  auto state = client->GetClientState();
650  auto character = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity();
651 
652  auto demon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
653  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(
654  activated->GetActivationObjectID())));
655  if(demon == nullptr)
656  {
657  LOG_ERROR("Attempted to summon a demon that does not exist.\n");
658  SendFailure(activated, client,
659  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_INVALID);
660  return false;
661  }
662 
663  // Calculate MAG cost
664  uint32_t demonType = demon->GetType();
665  auto demonStats = demon->GetCoreStats().Get();
666  auto demonData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demonType);
667 
668  int16_t characterLNC = character->GetLNC();
669  int16_t demonLNC = demonData->GetBasic()->GetLNC();
670  int8_t level = demonStats->GetLevel();
671  uint8_t magMod = demonData->GetSummonData()->GetMagModifier();
672 
673  double lncAdjust = characterLNC == 0
674  ? pow(demonLNC, 2.0f)
675  : (pow(abs(characterLNC), -0.06f) * pow(characterLNC - demonLNC, 2.0f));
676  double magAdjust = (double)(level * magMod);
677 
678  double mag = (magAdjust * lncAdjust / 18000000.0) + (magAdjust * 0.25);
679 
680  itemCosts[SVR_CONST.ITEM_MAGNETITE] = (uint32_t)round(mag);
681  }
682  }
683  else
684  {
685  auto costs = skillData->GetCondition()->GetCosts();
686  for(auto cost : costs)
687  {
688  auto num = cost->GetCost();
689  bool percentCost = cost->GetNumType() == objects::MiCostTbl::NumType_t::PERCENT;
690  switch(cost->GetType())
691  {
692  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::HP:
693  if(percentCost)
694  {
695  hpCostPercent = (uint32_t)(hpCostPercent + num);
696  }
697  else
698  {
699  hpCost = (int32_t)(hpCost + num);
700  }
701  break;
702  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::MP:
703  if(percentCost)
704  {
705  mpCostPercent = (uint32_t)(mpCostPercent + num);
706  }
707  else
708  {
709  mpCost = (int32_t)(mpCost + num);
710  }
711  break;
712  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::ITEM:
713  if(percentCost)
714  {
715  LOG_ERROR("Item percent cost encountered.\n");
716  SendFailure(activated, client);
717  return false;
718  }
719  else
720  {
721  auto itemID = cost->GetItem();
722  if(itemCosts.find(itemID) == itemCosts.end())
723  {
724  itemCosts[itemID] = 0;
725  }
726  itemCosts[itemID] = (uint32_t)(itemCosts[itemID] + num);
727  }
728  break;
729  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::BULLET:
730  if(percentCost)
731  {
732  LOG_ERROR("Bullet percent cost encountered.\n");
733  SendFailure(activated, client);
734  return false;
735  }
736  else
737  {
738  bulletCost = (uint16_t)(bulletCost + num);
739  }
740  break;
741  default:
742  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unsupported cost type encountered: %1\n")
743  .Arg((uint8_t)cost->GetType()));
744  SendFailure(activated, client);
745  return false;
746  }
747  }
748  }
749 
750  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
751 
752  // Get final HP cost
753  if(hpCost != 0 || hpCostPercent != 0)
754  {
755  hpCost = (int32_t)(hpCost + ceil(((float)hpCostPercent * 0.01f) *
756  (float)source->GetMaxHP()));
757 
758  double multiplier = 1.0;
759  for(double adjust : tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(source,
760  TokuseiAspectType::HP_COST_ADJUST, pSkill->SourceExecutionState))
761  {
762  multiplier = adjust <= -100.0 ? 0.0 : (multiplier *
763  (1.0 + adjust * 0.01));
764  }
765 
766  hpCost = (int32_t)ceil((double)hpCost * multiplier);
767 
768  if(hpCost < 0)
769  {
770  hpCost = 0;
771  }
772  }
773 
774  // Get final MP cost
775  if(mpCost != 0 || mpCostPercent != 0)
776  {
777  mpCost = (int32_t)(mpCost + ceil(((float)mpCostPercent * 0.01f) *
778  (float)source->GetMaxMP()));
779 
780  double multiplier = 1.0;
781  for(double adjust : tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(source,
782  TokuseiAspectType::MP_COST_ADJUST, pSkill->SourceExecutionState))
783  {
784  multiplier = adjust <= -100.0 ? 0.0 : (multiplier *
785  (1.0 + adjust * 0.01));
786  }
787 
788  mpCost = (int32_t)ceil((double)mpCost * multiplier);
789 
790  if(mpCost < 0)
791  {
792  mpCost = 0;
793  }
794  }
795 
796  auto sourceStats = source->GetCoreStats();
797  bool canPay = ((hpCost == 0) || hpCost < sourceStats->GetHP()) &&
798  ((mpCost == 0) || mpCost <= sourceStats->GetMP());
799 
800  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
801 
802  if(itemCosts.size() > 0 || bulletCost > 0)
803  {
804  if(client)
805  {
806  auto state = client->GetClientState();
807  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
808  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
809 
810  for(auto itemCost : itemCosts)
811  {
812  auto existingItems = characterManager->GetExistingItems(character,
813  itemCost.first);
814  uint32_t itemCount = 0;
815  for(auto item : existingItems)
816  {
817  itemCount = (uint32_t)(itemCount + item->GetStackSize());
818  }
819 
820  if(itemCount < itemCost.second)
821  {
822  canPay = false;
823  break;
824  }
825  }
826 
827  if(bulletCost > 0)
828  {
829  auto bullets = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
830  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS);
831  if(!bullets || bullets->GetStackSize() < bulletCost)
832  {
833  canPay = false;
834  }
835  }
836  }
837  else
838  {
839  // Non-player entities cannot pay item-based costs
840  canPay = false;
841  }
842  }
843 
844  // Handle costs that can't be paid as expected errors
845  if(!canPay)
846  {
847  SendFailure(activated, client,
848  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_COST);
849  return false;
850  }
851 
852  activated->SetHPCost(hpCost);
853  activated->SetMPCost(mpCost);
854  activated->SetBulletCost(bulletCost);
855  activated->SetItemCosts(itemCosts);
856  }
857 
858  activated->SetExecutionTime(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
859 
860  // Execute the skill
861  auto fIter = mSkillFunctions.find(functionID);
862  if(fIter == mSkillFunctions.end())
863  {
864  switch(skillCategory)
865  {
866  case 1:
867  // Active
868  return ExecuteNormalSkill(client, activated, ctx);
869  case 2:
870  // Switch
871  return ToggleSwitchSkill(client, activated, ctx);
872  case 0:
873  // Passive, shouldn't happen
874  default:
875  SendFailure(activated, client,
876  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
877  return false;
878  break;
879  }
880  }
881 
882  // Only execute special function skills if the source was a player
883  bool success = client && fIter->second(*this, activated, ctx, client);
884  if(success)
885  {
886  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
887  }
888  else
889  {
890  // Skip finalization if performing an instant activation
891  if(skillData->GetBasic()->GetActivationType() != 6)
892  {
893  SendCompleteSkill(activated, 1);
894  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
895  }
896  }
897 
898  return success;
899 }
900 
901 bool SkillManager::CancelSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
902  int8_t activationID)
903 {
904  auto activated = GetActivation(source, activationID);
905  if(!activated)
906  {
907  return false;
908  }
909  else
910  {
911  auto server = mServer.lock();
912  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
913  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
914 
915  // If the skill is a special toggle, fire its function again
916  auto functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
917  auto fIter = mSkillFunctions.find(functionID);
918  if(fIter != mSkillFunctions.end() &&
919  skillData->GetBasic()->GetActivationType() == 4)
920  {
921  auto ctx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
922  fIter->second(*this, activated, ctx, nullptr);
923  }
924 
925  // If any executions have occurred, the cooldown needs to be activated
926  if(activated->GetExecuteCount() > 0)
927  {
928  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, nullptr, nullptr);
929  SetSkillCompleteState(pSkill, false);
930  }
931 
932  if(source->GetSpecialActivations(activationID) == activated)
933  {
934  source->RemoveSpecialActivations(activationID);
935  }
936 
937  if(source->GetActivatedAbility() == activated)
938  {
939  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
940  }
941 
942  SendCompleteSkill(activated, 1);
943  return true;
944  }
945 }
946 
947 void SkillManager::SendFailure(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
948  uint32_t skillID, const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
949  uint8_t errorCode)
950 {
951  libcomp::Packet p;
952  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_FAILED);
953  p.WriteS32Little(source ? source->GetEntityID() : -1);
954  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
955  p.WriteS8(-1); //Unknown
956  p.WriteU8(0); //Unknown
957  p.WriteU8(errorCode);
958  p.WriteS32Little(-1); //Unknown
959 
960  if(client)
961  {
962  client->SendPacket(p);
963  }
964  else if(source && source->GetZone())
965  {
966  auto zConnections = source->GetZone()->GetConnectionList();
967  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
968  }
969 }
970 
971 void SkillManager::SendFailure(
972  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
973  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client, uint8_t errorCode)
974 {
975  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
976  {
977  SendExecuteSkillInstant(activated, errorCode);
978  }
979  else
980  {
981  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
982  activated->GetSourceEntity());
983  SendFailure(source, activated->GetSkillID(), client, errorCode);
984  }
985 }
986 
987 std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> SkillManager::GetActivation(
988  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source, int8_t activationID) const
989 {
990  auto activated = source->GetSpecialActivations(activationID);
991  if(activated)
992  {
993  return activated;
994  }
995 
996  activated = source ? source->GetActivatedAbility() : nullptr;
997  if(nullptr == activated || activationID != activated->GetActivationID())
998  {
999  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unknown activation ID encountered: %1\n")
1000  .Arg(activationID));
1001  return nullptr;
1002  }
1003 
1004  return activated;
1005 }
1006 
1007 bool SkillManager::ExecuteNormalSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
1008  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
1009  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx)
1010 {
1011  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
1012  activated->GetSourceEntity());
1013  if(!source)
1014  {
1015  return false;
1016  }
1017 
1018  auto zone = source->GetZone();
1019  if(!zone)
1020  {
1021  return false;
1022  }
1023 
1024  auto server = mServer.lock();
1025  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
1026  auto skillID = activated->GetSkillID();
1027  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
1028 
1029  uint32_t projectileSpeed = skillData->GetDischarge()->GetProjectileSpeed();
1030  if(projectileSpeed == 0)
1031  {
1032  // Non-projectile skill, calculate damage and effects immediately
1033  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
1034  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
1035  {
1036  SendFailure(activated, client);
1037  return false;
1038  }
1039 
1040  return true;
1041  }
1042  else
1043  {
1044  // Check for the target
1045  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
1046  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
1047 
1048  // If it isn't valid at this point, fail the skill
1049  if(!target)
1050  {
1051  SendFailure(activated, client);
1052  return false;
1053  }
1054 
1055  // Determine time from projectile speed and distance
1056  source->RefreshCurrentPosition(activated->GetExecutionTime());
1057  target->RefreshCurrentPosition(activated->GetExecutionTime());
1058 
1059  float distance = source->GetDistance(target->GetCurrentX(),
1060  target->GetCurrentY());
1061  uint16_t maxTargetRange = (uint16_t)(400 + (skillData->GetTarget()->GetRange() * 10));
1062  if((float)maxTargetRange < distance)
1063  {
1064  // Out of range, fail execution
1065  SendFailure(activated, client);
1066  return false;
1067  }
1068 
1069  // Complete the skill, calculate damage and effects when the projectile hits
1070  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
1071 
1072  // Projectile speed is measured in how many 10ths of a unit the projectile will
1073  // traverse per millisecond (with a half second delay for the default cast to projectile
1074  // move speed)
1075  uint64_t addMicro = (uint64_t)((double)distance / (projectileSpeed * 10)) * 1000000;
1076  uint64_t processTime = (activated->GetExecutionTime() + addMicro) + 500000ULL;
1077 
1078  server->ScheduleWork(processTime, [](const std::shared_ptr<ChannelServer> pServer,
1079  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> pActivated,
1080  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> pCtx)
1081  {
1082  pServer->GetSkillManager()->ProcessSkillResult(pActivated, pCtx);
1083  }, server, activated, ctx);
1084  }
1085 
1086  return true;
1087 }
1088 
1089 bool SkillManager::ProcessSkillResult(std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
1090  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
1091 {
1092  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
1093  auto zone = source->GetZone();
1094  if(!zone)
1095  {
1096  return false;
1097  }
1098 
1099  auto server = mServer.lock();
1100  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
1101  auto skillID = activated->GetSkillID();
1102  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
1103 
1104  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx, nullptr);
1105  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
1106 
1107  // Get the target of the spell, keeping track of initial NRA
1108  uint8_t initialHitNull = 0;
1109  uint8_t initialHitReflect = 0;
1110  bool initialHitAbsorb = false;
1111  bool targetChanged = false;
1112  switch(skillData->GetTarget()->GetType())
1113  {
1114  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE:
1115  // Source is technically the primary target (though most of
1116  // these types of skills will filter it out)
1117  skill.PrimaryTarget = source;
1118  break;
1119  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY:
1120  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_ALLY:
1121  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTNER:
1122  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTY:
1123  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ENEMY:
1124  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_PARTNER:
1125  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_PLAYER:
1126  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_DEMON:
1127  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_PLAYER:
1128  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_DEMON:
1129  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PLAYER:
1130  {
1131  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
1132  auto targetEntity = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
1133 
1134  if(!targetEntity)
1135  {
1136  // Target is not valid anymore
1138  break;
1139  }
1140 
1141  if(targetEntity != source)
1142  {
1143  // Rotate the source to face the target
1144  float destRot = (float)atan2(
1145  source->GetCurrentY() - targetEntity->GetCurrentY(),
1146  source->GetCurrentX() - targetEntity->GetCurrentX());
1147  source->SetCurrentRotation(destRot);
1148  source->SetOriginRotation(destRot);
1149  source->SetDestinationRotation(destRot);
1150  }
1151 
1152  SkillTargetResult target;
1153  target.EntityState = targetEntity;
1154  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(targetEntity, pSkill, true, source);
1155  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, targetEntity);
1156 
1157  if(SetNRA(target, skill))
1158  {
1159  // The skill is reflected and the source becomes
1160  // the primary target
1161  skill.PrimaryTarget = source;
1162  skill.EffectiveSource = targetEntity;
1163  skill.Reflected = true;
1164  skill.Targets.push_back(target);
1165 
1166  // Determine NRA for reflect
1167  SkillTargetResult selfTarget;
1168  selfTarget.EntityState = source;
1169  selfTarget.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, true, source);
1170  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, source);
1171  SetNRA(selfTarget, skill);
1172 
1173  initialHitNull = selfTarget.HitNull;
1174  initialHitReflect = selfTarget.HitReflect;
1175  initialHitAbsorb = selfTarget.HitAbsorb;
1176  targetChanged = true;
1177  }
1178  else
1179  {
1180  skill.PrimaryTarget = targetEntity;
1181 
1182  initialHitNull = target.HitNull;
1183  initialHitAbsorb = target.HitAbsorb;
1184 
1185  // If it had been reflected we wouldn't be here!
1186  initialHitReflect = 0;
1187  }
1188  }
1189  break;
1190  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OBJECT:
1191  // Nothing special to do (for now)
1192  break;
1193  default:
1194  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unknown target type encountered: %1\n")
1195  .Arg((uint8_t)skillData->GetTarget()->GetType()));
1196  return false;
1197  }
1198 
1199  auto effectiveSource = skill.EffectiveSource;
1200  auto primaryTarget = skill.PrimaryTarget;
1201 
1202  auto skillRange = skillData->GetRange();
1203  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> effectiveTargets;
1204  if(skillRange->GetAreaType() != objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::NONE)
1205  {
1206  // Determine area effects
1207  // Unlike damage calculations, this will use effectiveSource instead
1208  // of source since reflects may have changed the context of the skill
1209 
1210  double aoeRange = (double)(skillRange->GetAoeRange() * 10);
1211 
1212  switch(skillRange->GetAreaType())
1213  {
1214  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE:
1215  // Not exactly an area but skills targetting the source only should pass
1216  // both this check and area target type filtering for "Ally" or "Source"
1217  effectiveTargets.push_back(effectiveSource);
1218  break;
1219  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS:
1220  if(!targetChanged)
1221  {
1222  effectiveTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
1223  effectiveSource->GetCurrentX(), effectiveSource->GetCurrentY(), aoeRange);
1224  }
1225  break;
1226  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::TARGET_RADIUS:
1227  // If the primary target is set and NRA did not occur, gather other targets
1228  if(primaryTarget && !initialHitNull && !initialHitReflect && !initialHitAbsorb)
1229  {
1230  effectiveTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
1231  primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(), primaryTarget->GetCurrentY(),
1232  aoeRange);
1233  }
1234  break;
1235  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_1:
1236  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_2:
1237  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_3:
1238  if(!targetChanged)
1239  {
1241 
1242  float sourceX = effectiveSource->GetCurrentX();
1243  float sourceY = effectiveSource->GetCurrentY();
1244 
1245  double maxTargetRange = (double)(skillData->GetTarget()->GetRange() * 10);
1246 
1247  // Get entities in range using the target distance
1248  auto potentialTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
1249  sourceX, sourceY, maxTargetRange);
1250 
1251  // Center pointer of the arc
1252  float sourceRot = ActiveEntityState::CorrectRotation(
1253  effectiveSource->GetCurrentRotation());
1254 
1255  // AoE range for this is the percentage of a half circle included on either side
1256  // (ex: 20 would mean 20% of a full radian on both sides is included and 100 would
1257  // behave like a source radius AoE)
1258  float maxRotOffset = (float)aoeRange * 0.001f * 3.14f;
1259 
1260  effectiveTargets = ZoneManager::GetEntitiesInFoV(potentialTargets, sourceX,
1261  sourceY, sourceRot, maxRotOffset);
1262  }
1263  break;
1264  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::STRAIGHT_LINE:
1265  if(!targetChanged && primaryTarget)
1266  {
1267  // Create a rotated rectangle to represent the line with
1268  // a designated width equal to the AoE range
1269 
1270  Point src(effectiveSource->GetCurrentX(),
1271  effectiveSource->GetCurrentY());
1272 
1273  Point dest(primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(),
1274  primaryTarget->GetCurrentY());
1275 
1276  float lineWidth = (float)aoeRange * 0.5f;
1277 
1278  std::list<Point> rect;
1279  if(dest.y != src.y)
1280  {
1281  // Set the line rectangle corner points from the source,
1282  // destination and perpendicular slope
1283 
1284  float pSlope = ((dest.x - src.x)/(dest.y - src.y)) * -1.f;
1285  float denom = (float)std::sqrt(1.0f + std::pow(pSlope, 2));
1286 
1287  float xOffset = (float)(lineWidth / denom);
1288  float yOffset = (float)fabs((pSlope * lineWidth) / denom);
1289 
1290  if(pSlope > 0)
1291  {
1292  rect.push_back(Point(src.x + xOffset, src.y + yOffset));
1293  rect.push_back(Point(src.x - xOffset, src.y - yOffset));
1294  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x - xOffset, dest.y - yOffset));
1295  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x + xOffset, dest.y + yOffset));
1296  }
1297  else
1298  {
1299  rect.push_back(Point(src.x - xOffset, src.y + yOffset));
1300  rect.push_back(Point(src.x + xOffset, src.y - yOffset));
1301  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x - xOffset, dest.y + yOffset));
1302  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x + xOffset, dest.y - yOffset));
1303  }
1304  }
1305  else if(dest.x != src.x)
1306  {
1307  // Horizontal line, add points directly to +Y/-Y
1308  rect.push_back(Point(src.x, src.y + lineWidth));
1309  rect.push_back(Point(src.x, src.y - lineWidth));
1310  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x, dest.y - lineWidth));
1311  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x, dest.y + lineWidth));
1312  }
1313  else
1314  {
1315  // Same point, only add the target
1316  effectiveTargets.push_back(primaryTarget);
1317  break;
1318  }
1319 
1320  for(auto t : zone->GetActiveEntities())
1321  {
1322  Point p(t->GetCurrentX(), t->GetCurrentY());
1323  if(ZoneManager::PointInPolygon(p, rect))
1324  {
1325  effectiveTargets.push_back(t);
1326  }
1327  }
1328  }
1329  break;
1330  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::UNKNOWN_9:
1331  default:
1332  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unsupported skill area type encountered: %1\n")
1333  .Arg((uint8_t)skillRange->GetAreaType()));
1334  return false;
1335  }
1336  }
1337 
1338  // Remove all targets that are not ready
1339  effectiveTargets.remove_if([](
1340  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1341  {
1342  return !target->Ready();
1343  });
1344 
1345  // Make sure the primary target isn't in here twice and it is also
1346  // at the front of the list
1347  if(primaryTarget)
1348  {
1349  effectiveTargets.remove_if([primaryTarget](
1350  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1351  {
1352  return target == primaryTarget;
1353  });
1354  effectiveTargets.push_front(primaryTarget);
1355  }
1356 
1357  // Filter out invalid effective targets (including the primary target)
1359  auto validType = skillRange->GetValidType();
1360  switch(validType)
1361  {
1362  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::ENEMY:
1363  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource](
1364  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1365  {
1366  return (target->GetFaction() == effectiveSource->GetFaction()) ||
1367  !target->IsAlive();
1368  });
1369  break;
1370  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::ALLY:
1371  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::PARTY:
1372  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_ALLY:
1373  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY:
1374  {
1375  bool deadOnly = validType ==
1376  objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_ALLY ||
1377  validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY;
1378  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource, deadOnly](
1379  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1380  {
1381  return (target->GetFaction() != effectiveSource->GetFaction())
1382  || (deadOnly == target->IsAlive());
1383  });
1384 
1385  if(validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::PARTY ||
1386  validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY)
1387  {
1388  // This will result in an empty list if cast by an enemy, though
1389  // technically it should in that instance
1390  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(effectiveSource->GetEntityID());
1391  uint32_t sourcePartyID = sourceState ? sourceState->GetPartyID() : 0;
1392 
1393  effectiveTargets.remove_if([sourceState, sourcePartyID](
1394  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1395  {
1396  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(target->GetEntityID());
1397  return !state || (!sourcePartyID && state != sourceState) ||
1398  (sourcePartyID && state->GetPartyID() != sourcePartyID);
1399  });
1400  }
1401  }
1402  break;
1403  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::SOURCE:
1404  // Only affect source and partner or summoner
1405  {
1406  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
1407  effectiveSource->GetEntityID());
1408  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> otherValid;
1409  if(sourceState)
1410  {
1411  switch(effectiveSource->GetEntityType())
1412  {
1413  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
1414  otherValid = sourceState->GetDemonState();
1415  break;
1416  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
1417  otherValid = sourceState->GetCharacterState();
1418  break;
1419  default:
1420  // Shouldn't happen
1421  break;
1422  }
1423  }
1424 
1425  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource, otherValid](
1426  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1427  {
1428  return target != effectiveSource && target != otherValid;
1429  });
1430  }
1431  break;
1432  default:
1433  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unsupported skill valid target type encountered: %1\n")
1434  .Arg((uint8_t)validType));
1435  return false;
1436  }
1437 
1438  // Filter down to all valid targets, limited by AOE restrictions
1439  uint16_t aoeReflect = 0;
1440  int32_t aoeTargetCount = 0;
1441  int32_t aoeTargetMax = skillRange->GetAoeTargetMax();
1442  for(auto effectiveTarget : effectiveTargets)
1443  {
1444  bool isPrimaryTarget = effectiveTarget == primaryTarget;
1445 
1446  // Skip the primary target for the count which will always be first
1447  // in the list if it is still valid at this point
1448  if(!isPrimaryTarget &&
1449  aoeTargetMax > 0 && aoeTargetCount >= aoeTargetMax)
1450  {
1451  break;
1452  }
1453 
1454  SkillTargetResult target;
1455  target.PrimaryTarget = isPrimaryTarget;
1456  target.EntityState = effectiveTarget;
1457  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(effectiveTarget, pSkill, true,
1458  source);
1459  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, effectiveTarget);
1460 
1461  // Set NRA
1462  // If the primary target is still in the set and a reflect did not
1463  // occur, apply the initially calculated flags first
1464  // If an AOE target that is not the source is in the set, increase
1465  // the number of AOE reflections as needed
1466  bool isSource = effectiveTarget == source;
1467  if(isPrimaryTarget && !initialHitReflect)
1468  {
1469  target.HitNull = initialHitNull;
1470  target.HitAbsorb = initialHitAbsorb;
1471  target.HitAvoided = initialHitNull != 0;
1472  }
1473  else if(SetNRA(target, skill) && !isSource)
1474  {
1475  aoeReflect++;
1476  }
1477 
1478  skill.Targets.push_back(target);
1479 
1480  if(!isPrimaryTarget)
1481  {
1482  aoeTargetCount++;
1483  }
1484  }
1485 
1486  // For each time the skill was reflected by an AOE target, target the
1487  // source again as each can potentially have NRA and damage calculated
1488  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < aoeReflect; i++)
1489  {
1490  SkillTargetResult target;
1491  target.EntityState = source;
1492 
1493  // Calculate the effects done to and from the source itself
1494  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, true, source);
1495  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, source);
1496 
1497  skill.Targets.push_back(target);
1498  SetNRA(target, skill);
1499  }
1500 
1501  // If this is a counter, defer final processing to the skill being
1502  // countered (see below)
1503  if(ctx->CounteredSkill)
1504  {
1505  ctx->CounteredSkill->ExecutionContext->CounteringSkills.push_back(pSkill);
1506  }
1507  else
1508  {
1509  // Determine hit outcomes
1510  CheckSkillHits(source, pSkill);
1511 
1512  // Finalize the skill processing
1513  ProcessSkillResultFinal(pSkill);
1514 
1515  // Lastly if the skill was countered, finalize those too
1516  if(ctx->CounteringSkills.size() > 0)
1517  {
1518  for(auto counteringSkill : ctx->CounteringSkills)
1519  {
1520  ProcessSkillResultFinal(counteringSkill);
1521 
1522  // Now that we're done make sure we clean up context pointer
1523  counteringSkill->ExecutionContext = nullptr;
1524  }
1525  }
1526 
1527  // Clean up the related contexts as they are no longer needed
1528  ctx->CounteringSkills.clear();
1529  ctx->SubContexts.clear();
1530  }
1531 
1532  return true;
1533 }
1534 
1535 void SkillManager::ProcessSkillResultFinal(const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
1536 {
1537  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
1538 
1539  auto activated = skill.Activated;
1540  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
1541  auto zone = source->GetZone();
1542  if(!zone)
1543  {
1544  // Somehow the source left the zone, quit out
1545  return;
1546  }
1547 
1548  auto server = mServer.lock();
1549  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
1550  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
1551  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
1552  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
1553 
1554  // Quit here if nothing will be affected by damage or effects
1555  if(skill.Targets.size() == 0)
1556  {
1557  libcomp::Packet p;
1558  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_REPORTS);
1559  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
1560  p.WriteU32Little(skill.SkillID);
1561  p.WriteS8(0);
1562  p.WriteU32Little(0);
1563 
1564  zoneManager->BroadcastPacket(zone, p);
1565 
1566  return;
1567  }
1568 
1569  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage();
1570  bool hasBattleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula()
1571  != objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE;
1572  if(hasBattleDamage)
1573  {
1574  auto battleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage();
1575  if(!CalculateDamage(source, pSkill))
1576  {
1577  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Damage failed to calculate: %1\n")
1578  .Arg(skill.SkillID));
1579  return;
1580  }
1581 
1582  // Now that damage has been calculated, merge final NRA flags in
1583  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
1584  {
1585  switch(target.HitNull)
1586  {
1587  case 1:
1588  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_BLOCK_PHYS;
1589  break;
1590  case 2:
1591  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_BLOCK_MAGIC;
1592  break;
1593  default:
1594  break;
1595  }
1596 
1597  switch(target.HitReflect)
1598  {
1599  case 1:
1600  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REFLECT_PHYS;
1601  break;
1602  case 2:
1603  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REFLECT_MAGIC;
1604  break;
1605  default:
1606  break;
1607  }
1608 
1609  if(target.HitAbsorb)
1610  {
1611  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_ABSORB;
1612  }
1613  }
1614 
1615  // Now that damage is calculated, apply drain
1616  uint8_t hpDrainPercent = battleDamage->GetHPDrainPercent();
1617  uint8_t mpDrainPercent = battleDamage->GetMPDrainPercent();
1618  if(hpDrainPercent > 0 || mpDrainPercent > 0)
1619  {
1620  auto selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
1621 
1622  int32_t hpDrain = 0, mpDrain = 0;
1623  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
1624  {
1625  if(target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC && hpDrainPercent > 0)
1626  {
1627  hpDrain = (int32_t)(hpDrain -
1628  (int32_t)floorl((float)target.Damage1 * (float)hpDrainPercent * 0.01f));
1629  }
1630 
1631  if(target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC && mpDrainPercent > 0)
1632  {
1633  mpDrain = (int32_t)(mpDrain -
1634  (int32_t)floorl((float)target.Damage2 * (float)mpDrainPercent * 0.01f));
1635  }
1636  }
1637 
1638  // Always heal HP even if value is 0
1639  selfTarget->Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING;
1640  selfTarget->Damage1 = hpDrain;
1641 
1642  // Heal MP only if the value is less than 0
1643  if(mpDrain < 0)
1644  {
1645  selfTarget->Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING;
1646  selfTarget->Damage2 = mpDrain;
1647  }
1648  }
1649  }
1650 
1651  // Get knockback info
1652  auto skillKnockback = damageData->GetKnockBack();
1653  int8_t kbMod = skillKnockback->GetModifier();
1654  uint8_t kbType = skillKnockback->GetKnockBackType();
1655  float kbDistance = (float)(skillKnockback->GetDistance() * 10);
1656 
1657  // Get negotiation damage
1658  auto talkDamage = damageData->GetNegotiationDamage();
1659  int8_t talkAffSuccess = talkDamage->GetSuccessAffability();
1660  int8_t talkAffFailure = talkDamage->GetFailureAffability();
1661  int8_t talkFearSuccess = talkDamage->GetSuccessFear();
1662  int8_t talkFearFailure = talkDamage->GetFailureFear();
1663  bool hasTalkDamage = talkAffSuccess != 0 || talkAffFailure != 0 ||
1664  talkFearSuccess != 0 || talkFearFailure != 0;
1665 
1666  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
1667  source->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
1668 
1669  // By default add the skill source to a possible entity set that can
1670  // have durability adjusted or learn inherited skills and let the
1671  // corresponding functions sort it out
1672  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> durabilityHit;
1673  durabilityHit.insert(source);
1674 
1675  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> learningSkills;
1676  learningSkills.insert(source);
1677 
1678  // Apply calculation results, keeping track of entities that may
1679  // need to update the world with their modified state
1680  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> revived;
1681  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> killed;
1682  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> displayStateModified;
1683  std::list<std::pair<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>, uint8_t>> talkDone;
1684  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>, uint8_t> cancellations;
1685  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>,
1686  std::set<TokuseiConditionType>> recalcEntities;
1687  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
1688  {
1689  switch(target.EntityState->GetEntityType())
1690  {
1691  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
1692  if(!target.HitAvoided)
1693  {
1694  durabilityHit.insert(target.EntityState);
1695  }
1696  break;
1697  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
1698  // Even if the hit is avoided, anything that touches the entity will
1699  // update inheriting skills
1700  learningSkills.insert(target.EntityState);
1701  break;
1702  default:
1703  break;
1704  }
1705 
1706  if(target.HitAvoided) continue;
1707 
1708  auto targetCalc = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
1709  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
1710 
1711  target.EntityState->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
1712  cancellations[target.EntityState] = 0;
1713 
1714  int32_t hpDamage = target.TechnicalDamage + target.PursuitDamage;
1715  int32_t mpDamage = 0;
1716  if(hasBattleDamage)
1717  {
1718  for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
1719  {
1720  bool hpMode = i == 0;
1721  int32_t val = i == 0 ? target.Damage1 : target.Damage2;
1722  uint8_t type = i == 0 ? target.Damage1Type : target.Damage2Type;
1723 
1724  switch(type)
1725  {
1726  case DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING:
1727  case DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN:
1728  if(hpMode)
1729  {
1730  hpDamage = (int32_t)(hpDamage + val);
1731  }
1732  else
1733  {
1734  mpDamage = (int32_t)(mpDamage + val);
1735  }
1736  break;
1737  default:
1738  if(hpMode)
1739  {
1740  hpDamage = (int32_t)(hpDamage + val);
1741  }
1742  break;
1743  }
1744  }
1745  }
1746 
1747  // Perform knockback if there is normal damage but no damage potential
1748  // or if damage will be dealt (since effective damage cannot be set to
1749  // zero past at this point)
1750  auto battleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage();
1751  bool applyKnockback = (battleDamage->GetFormula()
1752  == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL &&
1753  battleDamage->GetModifier1() == 0 &&
1754  battleDamage->GetModifier2() == 0) || hpDamage > 0;
1755  if(applyKnockback && kbMod)
1756  {
1757  // Check if the source removes knockback
1758  int32_t kbRemove = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
1759  TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_REMOVE, calcState) * 100;
1760 
1761  // Check if the target nulls knockback
1762  int32_t kbNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
1763  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_NULL,
1764  targetCalc) * 100;
1765 
1766  target.CanKnockback = (kbRemove != 10000 ||
1767  (kbRemove < 0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) > kbRemove)) ||
1768  (kbNull != 10000 &&
1769  (kbNull < 0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) > kbNull));
1770 
1771  if(target.CanKnockback)
1772  {
1773  float kbRecoverBoost = (float)(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
1774  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_RECOVERY,
1775  targetCalc) * 0.01);
1776 
1777  float kb = target.EntityState->UpdateKnockback(now, kbMod,
1778  kbRecoverBoost);
1779  if(kb == 0.f)
1780  {
1781  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_KNOCKBACK;
1782  cancellations[target.EntityState] |= EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK;
1783  }
1784  }
1785  }
1786 
1787  // Now that knockback has been calculated, determine which status
1788  // effects to apply
1789  std::set<uint32_t> cancelOnKill;
1790  if(!(skill.ExecutionContext && !skill.ExecutionContext->ApplyStatusEffects) &&
1791  !target.IndirectTarget && !target.HitAbsorb)
1792  {
1793  cancelOnKill = HandleStatusEffects(source, target, pSkill);
1794  hpDamage += target.AilmentDamage;
1795  }
1796 
1797  // If death is applied, kill the target and stop HP damage
1798  bool targetKilled = false;
1799  int32_t hpAdjustedSum = 0, mpAdjusted = 0;
1800  if(target.AddedStatuses.find(SVR_CONST.STATUS_DEATH) !=
1801  target.AddedStatuses.end())
1802  {
1803  targetKilled = target.EntityState->SetHPMP(0, -1, false, true,
1804  0, hpAdjustedSum, mpAdjusted);
1805  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_INSTANT_DEATH;
1806  }
1807 
1808  // Now apply damage
1809  if(hpDamage != 0 || mpDamage != 0)
1810  {
1811  bool targetAlive = target.EntityState->IsAlive();
1812  bool secondaryDamage = (target.TechnicalDamage +
1813  target.PursuitDamage + target.AilmentDamage) > 0;
1814 
1815  // If the target can be killed by the hit, get clench chance
1816  // but only if secondary damage has not occurred and the skill
1817  // is not a suicide skill
1818  int32_t clenchChance = 0;
1819  if(hpDamage > 0 && targetAlive && !secondaryDamage &&
1820  (!pSkill->IsSuicide || target.EntityState != source))
1821  {
1822  // If reflect occurred, a special clench type must be active
1823  auto clenchType = pSkill->Reflected
1824  ? TokuseiAspectType::CLENCH_REFLECT_CHANCE
1825  : TokuseiAspectType::CLENCH_CHANCE;
1826 
1827  clenchChance = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
1828  target.EntityState, clenchType, targetCalc) * 100.0);
1829  }
1830 
1831  int32_t hpAdjusted;
1832  if(target.EntityState->SetHPMP(-hpDamage, -mpDamage, true,
1833  true, clenchChance, hpAdjusted, mpAdjusted))
1834  {
1835  // Changed from alive to dead or vice versa
1836  if(target.EntityState->GetEntityType() ==
1837  objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
1838  {
1839  // Reset accept revival
1840  auto targetClientState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
1841  target.EntityState->GetEntityID());
1842  if(targetClientState)
1843  {
1844  targetClientState->SetAcceptRevival(false);
1845  }
1846  }
1847 
1848  if(targetAlive)
1849  {
1850  targetKilled = true;
1851  }
1852  else
1853  {
1854  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REVIVAL;
1855  revived.insert(target.EntityState);
1856  }
1857  }
1858 
1859  hpAdjustedSum += hpAdjusted;
1860 
1861  // If the HP damage was changed and there are no secondary damage sources
1862  // update the target damage
1863  if(-hpAdjusted != hpDamage && !secondaryDamage)
1864  {
1865  target.Damage1 = -hpAdjusted;
1866  }
1867 
1868  if(mpAdjusted != 0)
1869  {
1870  recalcEntities[target.EntityState].insert(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_MP);
1871  }
1872  }
1873 
1874  if(hpAdjustedSum != 0)
1875  {
1876  recalcEntities[target.EntityState].insert(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP);
1877  }
1878 
1879  if(hpAdjustedSum < 0)
1880  {
1881  int32_t hitstunNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
1882  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::HITSTUN_NULL, targetCalc) * 100;
1883  target.CanHitstun = hitstunNull != 10000 &&
1884  (hitstunNull < 0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) > hitstunNull);
1885 
1886  cancellations[target.EntityState] |= EFFECT_CANCEL_HIT |
1887  EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE;
1888  }
1889 
1890  switch(target.EntityState->GetEntityType())
1891  {
1892  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
1893  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
1894  displayStateModified.insert(target.EntityState);
1895  break;
1896  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::ENEMY:
1897  if(hpAdjustedSum < 0)
1898  {
1899  // If an enemy is damaged by a player character or their
1900  // partner demon, keep track of the damage for the damage
1901  // race drop rule
1902  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
1903  source->GetEntityID());
1904  if(sourceState)
1905  {
1906  auto worldCID = sourceState->GetWorldCID();
1907 
1908  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(
1909  target.EntityState);
1910  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
1911  if(!enemy->DamageSourcesKeyExists(worldCID))
1912  {
1913  enemy->SetDamageSources(worldCID,
1914  (uint64_t)-hpAdjustedSum);
1915  }
1916  else
1917  {
1918  uint64_t damage = enemy->GetDamageSources(
1919  worldCID);
1920  damage = (uint64_t)(damage + (uint64_t)-hpAdjustedSum);
1921  enemy->SetDamageSources(worldCID, damage);
1922  }
1923  }
1924  }
1925  break;
1926  default:
1927  break;
1928  }
1929 
1930  // Set the killed state
1931  if(targetKilled)
1932  {
1933  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_LETHAL;
1934  cancellations[target.EntityState] |= EFFECT_CANCEL_DEATH;
1935  killed.insert(target.EntityState);
1936 
1937  for(uint32_t effectID : cancelOnKill)
1938  {
1939  target.AddedStatuses.erase(effectID);
1940  }
1941  }
1942 
1943  // Handle negotiation damage
1944  if(hasTalkDamage && target.EntityState->GetEntityType() ==
1945  objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::ENEMY &&
1946  killed.find(target.EntityState) == killed.end())
1947  {
1948  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(
1949  target.EntityState);
1950  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
1951  auto spawn = enemy->GetSpawnSource();
1952  if(enemy->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel() >
1953  source->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel())
1954  {
1955  // Enemies that are a higher level cannot be negotiated with
1956  break;
1957  }
1958 
1959  auto talkPoints = eState->GetTalkPoints(source->GetEntityID());
1960  auto demonData = eState->GetDevilData();
1961  auto negData = demonData->GetNegotiation();
1962  uint8_t affThreshold = (uint8_t)(100 - negData->GetAffabilityThreshold());
1963  uint8_t fearThreshold = (uint8_t)(100 - negData->GetFearThreshold());
1964 
1965  if(talkPoints.first >= affThreshold ||
1966  talkPoints.second >= fearThreshold)
1967  {
1968  // Nothing left to do
1969  break;
1970  }
1971 
1972  int32_t talkType = 0;
1973  switch(skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
1974  {
1975  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
1976  talkType = 1;
1977  break;
1978  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
1979  talkType = 2;
1980  break;
1981  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
1982  talkType = 3;
1983  break;
1984  default:
1985  break;
1986  }
1987 
1988  double talkSuccess = spawn ? (double)(100 - spawn->GetTalkResist()) : 0.0;
1989  if(talkType != 0 && talkSuccess != 0.0)
1990  {
1991  auto adjust = tokuseiManager->GetAspectMap(source,
1992  TokuseiAspectType::TALK_RATE,
1993  std::set<int32_t>{ 0, talkType }, calcState);
1994 
1995  for(auto pair : adjust)
1996  {
1997  talkSuccess += pair.second;
1998  }
1999  }
2000 
2001  bool success = talkSuccess > 0.0 &&
2002  RNG(uint16_t, 1, 100) <= (uint16_t)talkSuccess;
2003  int16_t aff = (int16_t)(talkPoints.first +
2004  (success ? talkAffSuccess : talkAffFailure));
2005  int16_t fear = (int16_t)(talkPoints.second +
2006  (success ? talkFearSuccess : talkFearFailure));
2007 
2008  talkPoints.first = aff < 0 ? 0 : (uint8_t)aff;
2009  talkPoints.second = fear < 0 ? 0 : (uint8_t)fear;
2010 
2011  eState->SetTalkPoints(source->GetEntityID(), talkPoints);
2012 
2013  if(talkPoints.first >= affThreshold ||
2014  talkPoints.second >= fearThreshold)
2015  {
2016  // Determine which outcomes are valid and randomly
2017  // select one
2018  int32_t minVal = 1;
2019  int32_t maxVal = 6;
2020 
2021  bool canJoin = true;
2022  bool canGift = true;
2023 
2024  uint8_t talkResults = spawn ? spawn->GetTalkResults() : 3;
2025  if((talkResults & 0x01) == 0)
2026  {
2027  canJoin = false;
2028  maxVal -= 2;
2029  }
2030 
2031  if((talkResults & 0x02) == 0)
2032  {
2033  canGift = false;
2034  maxVal -= 2;
2035  }
2036 
2037  int32_t outcome = RNG(int32_t, minVal, maxVal);
2038 
2039  // Shift the outcome to the proper position if some
2040  // results are not available
2041  if(!canJoin)
2042  {
2043  outcome += 2;
2044  }
2045 
2046  if(!canGift && outcome >= 3 && outcome <= 4)
2047  {
2048  outcome += 2;
2049  }
2050 
2051  switch(outcome)
2052  {
2053  case 1:
2054  target.TalkFlags = TALK_JOIN;
2055  break;
2056  case 2:
2057  target.TalkFlags = TALK_JOIN_2;
2058  break;
2059  case 3:
2060  target.TalkFlags = TALK_GIVE_ITEM;
2061  break;
2062  case 4:
2063  target.TalkFlags = TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2;
2064  break;
2065  case 5:
2066  target.TalkFlags = TALK_REJECT;
2067  break;
2068  case 6:
2069  default:
2070  target.TalkFlags = TALK_LEAVE;
2071  break;
2072  }
2073 
2074  if((target.TalkFlags == TALK_GIVE_ITEM ||
2075  target.TalkFlags == TALK_GIVE_ITEM) &&
2076  (!spawn || spawn->GiftsCount() == 0))
2077  {
2078  // No gifts mapped, leave instead
2079  target.TalkFlags = TALK_LEAVE;
2080  }
2081 
2082  std::pair<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>,
2083  uint8_t> pair(target.EntityState, target.TalkFlags);
2084  talkDone.push_back(pair);
2085  }
2086  else
2087  {
2088  target.TalkFlags = (success ? TALK_RESPONSE_1 : TALK_RESPONSE_4);
2089  }
2090  }
2091  }
2092 
2093  for(auto cancelPair : cancellations)
2094  {
2095  if(cancelPair.second)
2096  {
2097  auto eState = cancelPair.first;
2098  uint8_t cancelFlags = cancelPair.second;
2099 
2100  cancelPair.first->CancelStatusEffects(cancelFlags);
2101 
2102  // Check for skills that need to be cancelled
2103  if(cancelFlags & (EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE | EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK))
2104  {
2105  auto tActivated = eState->GetActivatedAbility();
2106  auto tSkillData = tActivated
2107  ? definitionManager->GetSkillData(tActivated->GetSkillID()) : nullptr;
2108  if(tSkillData)
2109  {
2110  auto tCancel = tSkillData->GetCast()->GetCancel();
2111  bool applyInterrupt = ((cancelFlags & EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE) != 0 &&
2112  tCancel->GetDamageCancel()) ||
2113  ((cancelFlags & EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK) != 0 &&
2114  tCancel->GetKnockbackCancel());
2115 
2116  if(applyInterrupt)
2117  {
2118  int32_t interruptNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
2119  source, TokuseiAspectType::CAST_INTERRUPT_NULL,
2120  GetCalculatedState(eState, pSkill, true, source)) * 100;
2121 
2122  bool cancelInterrupt = interruptNull >= 10000 ||
2123  (interruptNull > 0 && RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) <= interruptNull);
2124 
2125  if(!cancelInterrupt)
2126  {
2127  CancelSkill(eState, tActivated->GetActivationID());
2128  }
2129  }
2130  }
2131  }
2132 
2133  recalcEntities[cancelPair.first].insert(TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE);
2134  }
2135  }
2136 
2137  // Now that previous effects have been cancelled, add the new ones
2138  uint32_t effectTime = (uint32_t)std::time(0);
2139  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
2140  {
2141  if(target.AddedStatuses.size() > 0)
2142  {
2143  auto removed = target.EntityState->AddStatusEffects(
2144  target.AddedStatuses, definitionManager, effectTime, false);
2145  for(auto r : removed)
2146  {
2147  target.CancelledStatuses.insert(r);
2148  }
2149 
2150  recalcEntities[target.EntityState].insert(TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE);
2151  }
2152  }
2153 
2154  // Recalculate any effects that trigger from the skill effects
2155  if(recalcEntities.size() > 0)
2156  {
2157  std::unordered_map<int32_t, bool> effectRecalc;
2158  for(auto pair : recalcEntities)
2159  {
2160  std::unordered_map<int32_t, bool> result;
2161 
2162  // Anything with a status effect modified needs a full tokusei and stat recalc
2163  bool statusChanged = pair.second.find(TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE) !=
2164  pair.second.end();
2165  if(effectRecalc.find(pair.first->GetEntityID()) == effectRecalc.end())
2166  {
2167  if(statusChanged)
2168  {
2169  result = tokuseiManager->Recalculate(pair.first, true);
2170  }
2171  else
2172  {
2173  result = tokuseiManager->Recalculate(pair.first, pair.second);
2174  }
2175  }
2176 
2177  for(auto resultPair : result)
2178  {
2179  if(effectRecalc.find(resultPair.first) == effectRecalc.end())
2180  {
2181  effectRecalc[resultPair.first] = resultPair.second;
2182  }
2183  else
2184  {
2185  effectRecalc[resultPair.first] |= resultPair.second;
2186  }
2187  }
2188 
2189  if(statusChanged && !effectRecalc[pair.first->GetEntityID()])
2190  {
2191  characterManager->RecalculateStats(pair.first);
2192  }
2193  }
2194  }
2195 
2196  // Send negotiation results first since some are dependent upon the
2197  // skill hit
2198  if(talkDone.size() > 0)
2199  {
2200  HandleNegotiations(source, zone, talkDone);
2201  }
2202 
2203  bool doRush = skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
2204  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH && skill.PrimaryTarget;
2205  if(doRush)
2206  {
2207  SkillTargetResult* selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
2208  selfTarget->Flags1 |= FLAG1_RUSH_MOVEMENT;
2209  }
2210 
2211  auto effectiveSource = skill.EffectiveSource;
2212  auto primaryTarget = skill.PrimaryTarget;
2213  auto effectiveTarget = primaryTarget ? primaryTarget : effectiveSource;
2214 
2215  uint64_t hitTimings[3];
2216  uint64_t completeTime = now +
2217  (skill.Definition->GetDischarge()->GetStiffness() * 1000);
2218  uint64_t hitStopTime = now +
2219  (skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetHitStopTime() * 1000);
2220 
2221  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
2222  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
2223 
2224  // The skill report packet can easily go over the max packet size so
2225  // the targets in the results need to be batched
2226  std::list<std::list<SkillTargetResult*>> targetBatches;
2227  std::list<SkillTargetResult*> currentBatch;
2228  int32_t currentBatchSize = 0;
2229  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
2230  {
2231  int32_t currentTargetSize = (int32_t)(64 + (target.AddedStatuses.size() * 9)
2232  + (target.CancelledStatuses.size() * 4));
2233 
2234  // If the new list size + the header size is larger than the max
2235  // packet size, move on to the next batch
2236  if((uint32_t)(currentBatchSize + currentTargetSize + 15) > MAX_CHANNEL_PACKET_SIZE)
2237  {
2238  targetBatches.push_back(currentBatch);
2239  currentBatch.clear();
2240  currentBatchSize = currentTargetSize;
2241  }
2242  else
2243  {
2244  currentBatchSize += currentTargetSize;
2245  }
2246 
2247  currentBatch.push_back(&target);
2248  }
2249 
2250  // If we get here with an empty target list, send the empty list
2251  targetBatches.push_back(currentBatch);
2252 
2253  for(auto it = targetBatches.begin(); it != targetBatches.end(); it++)
2254  {
2255  if(it != targetBatches.begin())
2256  {
2257  timeMap.clear();
2258 
2259  // An execute packet must be sent once per report (even if its
2260  // identical) or the client starts ignoring the reports
2261  SendExecuteSkill(pSkill->Activated);
2262  }
2263 
2264  libcomp::Packet p;
2265  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_REPORTS);
2266  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
2267  p.WriteU32Little(skill.SkillID);
2268  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
2269 
2270  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)it->size());
2271  for(SkillTargetResult* skillTarget : *it)
2272  {
2273  SkillTargetResult& target = *skillTarget;
2274 
2275  p.WriteS32Little(target.EntityState->GetEntityID());
2276  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.Damage1));
2277  p.WriteU8(target.Damage1Type);
2278  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.Damage2));
2279  p.WriteU8(target.Damage2Type);
2280  p.WriteU16Little(target.Flags1);
2281 
2282  p.WriteU8(target.AilmentDamageType);
2283  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.AilmentDamage));
2284 
2285  bool rushing = false, knockedBack = false;
2286  if((target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK) && kbType != 2)
2287  {
2288  uint8_t kbEffectiveType = kbType;
2289  if(kbType == 1 && target.PrimaryTarget)
2290  {
2291  // Targets of AOE knockback are treated like default knockback
2292  kbEffectiveType = 0;
2293  }
2294 
2295  // Ignore knockback type 2 which is "None"
2296  Point kbPoint(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX(),
2297  target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
2298  switch(kbEffectiveType)
2299  {
2300  case 1:
2301  {
2302  // Away from the effective target (ex: AOE explosion)
2303  kbPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(target.EntityState,
2304  effectiveTarget->GetCurrentX(), effectiveTarget->GetCurrentY(),
2305  kbDistance, true, now, hitStopTime);
2306  }
2307  break;
2308  case 4:
2309  if(target.EntityState != effectiveTarget)
2310  {
2311  // Move to the same spot as the target entity
2312  target.EntityState->SetOriginX(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX());
2313  target.EntityState->SetOriginY(target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
2314  target.EntityState->SetOriginTicks(now);
2315 
2316  target.EntityState->SetDestinationX(effectiveTarget->GetCurrentX());
2317  target.EntityState->SetDestinationY(effectiveTarget->GetCurrentY());
2318  target.EntityState->SetDestinationTicks(hitStopTime);
2319  }
2320  break;
2321  case 5:
2322  {
2323  // Oosition becomes source position
2324  target.EntityState->SetOriginX(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX());
2325  target.EntityState->SetOriginY(target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
2326  target.EntityState->SetOriginTicks(now);
2327 
2328  target.EntityState->SetDestinationX(source->GetCurrentX());
2329  target.EntityState->SetDestinationY(source->GetCurrentY());
2330  target.EntityState->SetDestinationTicks(hitStopTime);
2331  }
2332  break;
2333  case 0:
2334  case 3:
2335  default:
2336  // Default if not specified, directly away from source
2337  kbPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(target.EntityState, effectiveSource
2338  ->GetCurrentX(), effectiveSource->GetCurrentY(), kbDistance, true, now,
2339  hitStopTime);
2340  break;
2341  }
2342 
2343  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_KNOCKBACK,
2344  target.EntityState->GetDestinationTicks());
2345 
2346  p.WriteFloat(kbPoint.x);
2347  p.WriteFloat(kbPoint.y);
2348 
2349  knockedBack = true;
2350  }
2351  else if(target.EntityState == source && doRush)
2352  {
2353  // Set the new location of the rush user
2354  float dist = source->GetDistance(primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(),
2355  primaryTarget->GetCurrentY());
2356 
2357  Point rushPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(source, primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(),
2358  primaryTarget->GetCurrentY(), dist + 250.f, false, now, completeTime);
2359 
2360  p.WriteFloat(rushPoint.x);
2361  p.WriteFloat(rushPoint.y);
2362 
2363  rushing = true;
2364  }
2365  else
2366  {
2367  p.WriteBlank(8);
2368  }
2369 
2370  p.WriteFloat(0); // Unknown
2371 
2372  // Calculate hit timing
2373  hitTimings[0] = hitTimings[1] = hitTimings[2] = 0;
2374  if(rushing)
2375  {
2376  hitTimings[0] = now;
2377  hitTimings[1] = now + 200000;
2378  }
2379  else if(target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC || knockedBack)
2380  {
2381  if(target.Damage1)
2382  {
2383  // Damage dealt, determine stun time
2384  bool extendHitStun = target.AilmentDamageType != 0 || knockedBack;
2385  if(extendHitStun)
2386  {
2387  // Apply extended hit stop and determine what else may be needed
2388  hitTimings[0] = knockedBack ? now : completeTime;
2389  hitTimings[1] = hitStopTime;
2390 
2391  if(!target.AilmentDamageType)
2392  {
2393  // End after hit stop
2394  hitTimings[2] = hitStopTime;
2395  }
2396  else
2397  {
2398  // Apply ailment damage after hit stop
2399  hitTimings[2] = hitStopTime + target.AilmentDamageTime;
2400  }
2401  }
2402  else
2403  {
2404  // Normal hit stop (or complete only if hit stun nulled)
2405  hitTimings[2] = target.CanHitstun ? hitStopTime : completeTime;
2406  }
2407 
2408  if(target.CanHitstun)
2409  {
2410  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_HIT_STUN,
2411  hitTimings[2]);
2412  }
2413  }
2414  else if(knockedBack)
2415  {
2416  // Normal hit stop time to finish knockback
2417  hitTimings[0] = now;
2418  hitTimings[2] = hitTimings[1] = hitStopTime;
2419 
2420  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_HIT_STUN,
2421  hitTimings[2]);
2422  }
2423  else
2424  {
2425  // No damage, just result displays
2426  hitTimings[2] = completeTime;
2427  }
2428  }
2429 
2430  for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2431  {
2432  if(hitTimings[i])
2433  {
2434  timeMap[(uint32_t)(p.Size() + (4 * i))] = hitTimings[i];
2435  }
2436  }
2437 
2438  // Double back at the end and write client specific times
2439  p.WriteBlank(12);
2440 
2441  p.WriteU8(target.TalkFlags);
2442 
2443  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::StatusEffect>> addedStatuses;
2444  std::set<uint32_t> cancelledStatuses;
2445  if(target.AddedStatuses.size() > 0)
2446  {
2447  // Make sure the added statuses didn't get removed/re-added
2448  // already for some reason
2449  auto effects = target.EntityState->GetStatusEffects();
2450  for(auto added : target.AddedStatuses)
2451  {
2452  if(effects.find(added.first) != effects.end())
2453  {
2454  addedStatuses.push_back(effects[added.first]);
2455  }
2456  }
2457 
2458  for(auto cancelled : target.CancelledStatuses)
2459  {
2460  if(effects.find(cancelled) == effects.end())
2461  {
2462  cancelledStatuses.insert(cancelled);
2463  }
2464  }
2465  }
2466 
2467  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)addedStatuses.size());
2468  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)cancelledStatuses.size());
2469 
2470  for(auto effect : addedStatuses)
2471  {
2472  p.WriteU32Little(effect->GetEffect());
2473  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)effect->GetExpiration());
2474  p.WriteU8(effect->GetStack());
2475  }
2476 
2477  for(auto cancelled : cancelledStatuses)
2478  {
2479  p.WriteU32Little(cancelled);
2480  }
2481 
2482  p.WriteU16Little(target.Flags2);
2483  p.WriteS32Little(target.TechnicalDamage);
2484  p.WriteS32Little(target.PursuitDamage);
2485  }
2486 
2487  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
2488  }
2489 
2490  // Update inherited skills
2491  for(auto entity : durabilityHit)
2492  {
2493  HandleDurabilityDamage(entity, pSkill);
2494  }
2495 
2496  // Update inherited skills
2497  for(auto entity : learningSkills)
2498  {
2499  HandleSkillLearning(entity, pSkill);
2500  }
2501 
2502  // Report each revived entity
2503  for(auto entity : revived)
2504  {
2505  libcomp::Packet p;
2506  if(characterManager->GetEntityRevivalPacket(p, entity, 6))
2507  {
2508  zoneManager->BroadcastPacket(zone, p);
2509  }
2510  }
2511 
2512  // Set all killed entities
2513  if(killed.size() > 0)
2514  {
2515  HandleKills(source, zone, killed);
2516  }
2517 
2518  // Report all updates to the world
2519  if(displayStateModified.size() > 0)
2520  {
2521  characterManager->UpdateWorldDisplayState(displayStateModified);
2522  }
2523 }
2524 
2525 std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> SkillManager::GetProcessingSkill(
2526  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
2527  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx,
2528  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client)
2529 {
2530  if(ctx && ctx->Skill)
2531  {
2532  return ctx->Skill;
2533  }
2534 
2535  auto server = mServer.lock();
2536  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
2537  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
2538  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
2539  auto cSource = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
2540 
2541  auto skill = std::make_shared<ProcessingSkill>();
2542  skill->SkillID = activated->GetSkillID();
2543  skill->Definition = skillData;
2544  skill->Activated = activated;
2545  skill->BaseAffinity = skill->EffectiveAffinity = skillData->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
2546  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = skillData->GetBasic()->GetDependencyType();
2547  skill->EffectiveSource = source;
2548  skill->IsSuicide = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID() == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUICIDE;
2549 
2550  // Set the expertise and any boosts gained from ranks
2551  // The expertise type of a skill is determined by the first
2552  // type listed in the expertise growth list (defaults to attack)
2553  auto expGrowth = skillData->GetExpertGrowth();
2554  if(expGrowth.size() > 0)
2555  {
2556  skill->ExpertiseType = expGrowth.front()->GetExpertiseID();
2557  if(cSource)
2558  {
2559  skill->ExpertiseRankBoost = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
2560  definitionManager, skill->ExpertiseType);
2561  if(skill->ExpertiseType == EXPERTISE_ATTACK)
2562  {
2563  // Attack expertise gains an extra bonus from regal presence
2564  uint8_t boost2 = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(definitionManager,
2565  EXPERTISE_CHAIN_R_PRESENCE);
2566  skill->ExpertiseRankBoost = (uint8_t)(skill->ExpertiseRankBoost + boost2);
2567  }
2568  }
2569  }
2570 
2571  if(client)
2572  {
2573  auto state = client->GetClientState();
2574 
2575  int64_t targetObjectID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
2576  skill->IsItemSkill = targetObjectID != 0 &&
2577  std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Item>(
2578  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
2579  state->GetObjectUUID(targetObjectID)));
2580  }
2581 
2582  // Calculate effective dependency and affinity types if "weapon" is specified
2583  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == 4 || skill->BaseAffinity == 1)
2584  {
2585  auto weapon = cSource ? cSource->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
2586  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_WEAPON).Get() : nullptr;
2587  auto weaponDef = weapon ? definitionManager->GetItemData(weapon->GetType()) : nullptr;
2588 
2589  if(weaponDef)
2590  {
2591  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == 4)
2592  {
2593  switch(weaponDef->GetBasic()->GetWeaponType())
2594  {
2595  case objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE:
2596  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = 1;
2597  break;
2598  case objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::CLOSE_RANGE:
2599  default:
2600  // Use default below
2601  break;
2602  }
2603  }
2604 
2605  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
2606  {
2607  if(weaponDef->GetBasic()->GetWeaponType() ==
2608  objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE)
2609  {
2610  // If the bullet has an affinity, use that instead
2611  auto bullet = cSource ? cSource->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
2612  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS).Get() : nullptr;
2613  auto bulletDef = bullet ? definitionManager->GetItemData(bullet->GetType()) : nullptr;
2614  if(bulletDef && bulletDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity() != 0)
2615  {
2616  skill->EffectiveAffinity = bulletDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
2617  }
2618  }
2619 
2620  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
2621  {
2622  skill->EffectiveAffinity = weaponDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
2623  }
2624 
2625  // Take the lowest value applied tokusei affinity override if one exists
2626  auto tokuseiOverrides = server->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectValueList(source,
2627  TokuseiAspectType::WEAPON_AFFINITY_OVERRIDE);
2628  if(tokuseiOverrides.size() > 0)
2629  {
2630  tokuseiOverrides.sort();
2631  skill->EffectiveAffinity = (uint8_t)tokuseiOverrides.front();
2632  }
2633 
2634  skill->WeaponAffinity = skill->EffectiveAffinity;
2635  }
2636  }
2637 
2638  // If at any point the type cannot be determined,
2639  // default to strike, close range (ex: no weapon/non-character source)
2640  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
2641  {
2642  skill->EffectiveAffinity = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_STRIKE - RES_OFFSET;
2643  }
2644 
2645  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == 4)
2646  {
2647  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = 0;
2648  }
2649  }
2650 
2651  // Set any dependency type dependent properties
2652  if(cSource)
2653  {
2654  // Set the knowledge rank for critical and durability adjustment
2655  switch(skill->EffectiveDependencyType)
2656  {
2657  case 0:
2658  case 9:
2659  case 12:
2660  skill->KnowledgeRank = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(definitionManager,
2661  EXPERTISE_WEAPON_KNOWLEDGE);
2662  break;
2663  case 1:
2664  case 6:
2665  case 10:
2666  skill->KnowledgeRank = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(definitionManager,
2667  EXPERTISE_GUN_KNOWLEDGE);
2668  break;
2669  default:
2670  break;
2671  }
2672  }
2673 
2674  if(ctx)
2675  {
2676  skill->ExecutionContext = ctx.get();
2677  ctx->Skill = skill;
2678  }
2679 
2680  return skill;
2681 }
2682 
2683 
2684 std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> SkillManager::GetCalculatedState(
2685  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
2686  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
2687  bool isTarget, const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& otherState)
2688 {
2689  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
2690 
2691  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> calcState;
2692  if(isTarget)
2693  {
2694  calcState = skill.TargetCalcStates[eState->GetEntityID()];
2695  }
2696  else if(otherState)
2697  {
2698  calcState = skill.SourceCalcStates[otherState->GetEntityID()];
2699  }
2700 
2701  if(!calcState)
2702  {
2703  auto server = mServer.lock();
2704  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
2705 
2706  // Determine which tokusei are active and don't need to be calculated again
2707  if(!isTarget && otherState && skill.SourceExecutionState)
2708  {
2709  // If we're calculating for a skill target, start with the execution state
2710  calcState = skill.SourceExecutionState;
2711  }
2712  else
2713  {
2714  // Otherwise start with the base calculated state
2715  calcState = eState->GetCalculatedState();
2716  }
2717 
2718  // Keep track of tokusei that are not valid for the skill conditions but
