2719  // CAN become active given the correct target (only valid for source)
2720  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint16_t> stillPendingSkillTokusei;
2721 
2722  auto effectiveTokusei = calcState->GetEffectiveTokuseiFinal();
2723  auto pendingSkillTokusei = calcState->GetPendingSkillTokuseiFinal();
2724 
2725  bool modified = false;
2726  for(auto pair : pendingSkillTokusei)
2727  {
2728  auto tokusei = definitionManager->GetTokuseiData(pair.first);
2729  if(tokusei)
2730  {
2731  bool add = true;
2732  bool canAdd = true;
2733  for(auto condition : tokusei->GetSkillConditions())
2734  {
2735  canAdd &= condition->GetTargetCondition() == isTarget;
2736  if(!canAdd || !EvaluateTokuseiSkillCondition(eState,
2737  condition, pSkill, otherState))
2738  {
2739  add = false;
2740  break;
2741  }
2742  }
2743 
2744  if(add)
2745  {
2746  effectiveTokusei[tokusei->GetID()] = pair.second;
2747  modified = true;
2748  }
2749  else if(canAdd)
2750  {
2751  stillPendingSkillTokusei[tokusei->GetID()] = pair.second;
2752  }
2753  }
2754  }
2755 
2756  if(modified)
2757  {
2758  // If the tokusei set was modified, calculate skill specific stats
2759  auto aspects = calcState->GetExistingTokuseiAspects();
2760 
2761  calcState = std::make_shared<objects::CalculatedEntityState>();
2762  calcState->SetExistingTokuseiAspects(aspects);
2763  calcState->SetEffectiveTokusei(effectiveTokusei);
2764  calcState->SetPendingSkillTokusei(stillPendingSkillTokusei);
2765 
2766  eState->RecalculateStats(definitionManager, calcState);
2767  }
2768 
2769  if(isTarget)
2770  {
2771  skill.TargetCalcStates[eState->GetEntityID()] = calcState;
2772  }
2773  else if(otherState)
2774  {
2775  skill.SourceCalcStates[otherState->GetEntityID()] = calcState;
2776  }
2777  }
2778 
2779  return calcState;
2780 }
2781 
2782 bool SkillManager::EvaluateTokuseiSkillCondition(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
2783  const std::shared_ptr<objects::TokuseiSkillCondition>& condition,
2784  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
2785  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& otherState)
2786 {
2787  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
2788 
2789  // TokuseiSkillCondition comparators can only be equals or not equal
2790  bool negate = condition->GetComparator() == objects::TokuseiCondition::Comparator_t::NOT_EQUAL;
2791 
2792  switch(condition->GetSkillConditionType())
2793  {
2794  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ANY_SKILL:
2795  // Used to bind conditions to skill processing time only
2796  return true;
2797  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::EXPLICIT_SKILL:
2798  // Current skill is the specified skill
2799  return (skill.SkillID == (uint32_t)condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2800  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ACTION_TYPE:
2801  // Current skill is the specified action type
2802  return ((int32_t)skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
2803  condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2804  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::AFFINITY:
2805  // Current skill is the specified affinity type
2806  return ((int32_t)skill.BaseAffinity == condition->GetValue() ||
2807  (int32_t)skill.EffectiveAffinity == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2808  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::SKILL_CLASS:
2809  // Current skill is magic, physical or misc
2810  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
2811  {
2812  case 2:
2813  case 3:
2814  case 7:
2815  case 8:
2816  case 11:
2817  // Magic
2818  return (1 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2819  case 0:
2820  case 1:
2821  case 6:
2822  case 9:
2823  case 10:
2824  case 12:
2825  // Physical
2826  return (2 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2827  case 5:
2828  default:
2829  // Misc
2830  return (3 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2831  }
2832  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::SKILL_EXPERTISE:
2833  // Current skill is the specified expertise type
2834  return ((int32_t)skill.ExpertiseType == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2835  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_EQUIPPED:
2836  // Enemy has the specified item equipped (must be a character)
2837  if(!otherState)
2838  {
2839  // Error
2840  return false;
2841  }
2842  else
2843  {
2844  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(otherState);
2845 
2846  bool equipped = false;
2847  if(cState)
2848  {
2849  for(auto equip : cState->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems())
2850  {
2851  if(!equip.IsNull() && equip->GetType() == (uint32_t)condition->GetValue())
2852  {
2853  equipped = true;
2854  break;
2855  }
2856  }
2857  }
2858 
2859  return equipped == !negate;
2860  }
2861  break;
2862  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_FACTION:
2863  // Enemy is in a different faction (0) or the same faction (1)
2864  if(!otherState)
2865  {
2866  // Error
2867  return false;
2868  }
2869  else
2870  {
2871  bool sameFaction = otherState->GetFaction() == eState->GetFaction();
2872 
2873  return sameFaction == !negate;
2874  }
2875  break;
2876  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_GENDER:
2877  // Enemy's gender matches the specified type (can be any target type)
2878  if(!otherState)
2879  {
2880  // Error
2881  return false;
2882  }
2883  else
2884  {
2885  int32_t gender = (int32_t)objects::MiNPCBasicData::Gender_t::NONE;
2886 
2887  auto demonData = otherState->GetDevilData();
2888  if(demonData)
2889  {
2890  gender = demonData ? (int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetGender() : gender;
2891  }
2892  else if(otherState->GetEntityType() == objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
2893  {
2894  auto character = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(otherState)->GetEntity();
2895  gender = character ? (int32_t)character->GetGender() : gender;
2896  }
2897 
2898  return (gender == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2899  }
2900  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_LNC:
2901  // Enemy's LNC matches the specified type (can be any target type)
2902  return otherState &&
2903  (otherState->IsLNCType((uint8_t)condition->GetValue(), false) == !negate);
2904  default:
2905  break;
2906  }
2907 
2908  // The remaining conditions depend on the other entity being a demon
2909  auto demonData = otherState ? otherState->GetDevilData() : nullptr;
2910  if(!demonData)
2911  {
2912  // Rather than return the negation value, this case will always fail as it is an error
2913  return false;
2914  }
2915 
2916  switch(condition->GetSkillConditionType())
2917  {
2918  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_TYPE:
2919  // Demon is the specified type
2920  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetID() == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2921  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_FAMILY:
2922  // Demon is the specified family
2923  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetFamily() == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2924  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_RACE:
2925  // Demon is the specified race
2926  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace() == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2927  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_TITLE:
2928  // Demon has the specified title
2929  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetTitle() == condition->GetValue()) == !negate;
2930  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_PARTNER_MATCH:
2931  // Demon is the same family, race or type as the entity's partner demon
2932  {
2933  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData> partnerData;
2934  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(eState->GetEntityID(), false);
2935  if(state && state->GetCharacterState() == eState && state->GetDemonState()->Ready())
2936  {
2937  partnerData = state->GetDemonState()->GetDevilData();
2938  }
2939 
2940  if(!partnerData)
2941  {
2942  // Unlike the demon not existing, the partner not existing is not an error
2943  return negate;
2944  }
2945 
2946  switch(condition->GetValue())
2947  {
2948  case 0:
2949  // Same family
2950  return (partnerData->GetCategory()->GetFamily() ==
2951  demonData->GetCategory()->GetFamily()) == !negate;
2952  case 1:
2953  // Same race
2954  return (partnerData->GetCategory()->GetRace() ==
2955  demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace()) == !negate;
2956  case 2:
2957  // Same type
2958  return (partnerData->GetBasic()->GetID() ==
2959  demonData->GetBasic()->GetID()) == !negate;
2960  default:
2961  return false;
2962  }
2963  }
2964  break;
2965  default:
2966  break;
2967  }
2968 
2969  return false;
2970 }
2971 
2972 uint16_t SkillManager::CalculateOffenseValue(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
2973  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target,
2974  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
2975 {
2976  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
2977  if(skill.OffenseValues.find(target->GetEntityID()) != skill.OffenseValues.end())
2978  {
2979  return skill.OffenseValues[target->GetEntityID()];
2980  }
2981 
2982  uint16_t off = 0;
2983 
2984  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage();
2985  if(damageData->GetFormula() == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE)
2986  {
2987  // Damage is determined entirely from mod value, use 1 if countered somehow
2988  off = 1;
2989  }
2990  else
2991  {
2992  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target);
2993 
2994  int16_t clsr = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::CLSR);
2995  int16_t lngr = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::LNGR);
2996  int16_t spell = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::SPELL);
2997  int16_t support = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::SUPPORT);
2998 
2999  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
3000  {
3001  case 0:
3002  off = (uint16_t)clsr;
3003  break;
3004  case 1:
3005  off = (uint16_t)lngr;
3006  break;
3007  case 2:
3008  off = (uint16_t)spell;
3009  break;
3010  case 3:
3011  off = (uint16_t)support;
3012  break;
3013  case 6:
3014  off = (uint16_t)(lngr + spell / 2);
3015  break;
3016  case 7:
3017  off = (uint16_t)(spell + clsr / 2);
3018  break;
3019  case 8:
3020  off = (uint16_t)(spell + lngr / 2);
3021  break;
3022  case 9:
3023  off = (uint16_t)(clsr + lngr + spell);
3024  break;
3025  case 10:
3026  off = (uint16_t)(lngr + clsr + spell);
3027  break;
3028  case 11:
3029  off = (uint16_t)(spell + clsr + lngr);
3030  break;
3031  case 12:
3032  off = (uint16_t)(clsr + spell / 2);
3033  break;
3034  case 5:
3035  default:
3036  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Invalid dependency type for"
3037  " damage calculation encountered: %1\n")
3038  .Arg(skill.EffectiveDependencyType));
3039  return false;
3040  }
3041  }
3042 
3043  if(skill.ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill)
3044  {
3045  // If countering, modify the offensive value with the offense value
3046  // of the original skill used
3047  uint16_t counterOff = CalculateOffenseValue(target, source,
3048  skill.ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill);
3049 
3050  off = (uint16_t)(off + (counterOff * 2));
3051  }
3052 
3053  skill.OffenseValues[target->GetEntityID()] = off;
3054 
3055  return off;
3056 }

3058 void SkillManager::CheckSkillHits(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
3059  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
3060 {
3061  auto server = mServer.lock();
3062  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3063 
3064  // Check for counter first and stop if one succeeds
3065  for(SkillTargetResult& target : pSkill->Targets)
3066  {
3067  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
3068  if(tActivated && target.EntityState != source)
3069  {
3070  auto tSkillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(tActivated->GetSkillID());
3071  switch(tSkillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
3072  {
3073  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
3074  HandleGuard(source, target, pSkill);
3075  break;
3076  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::COUNTER:
3077  HandleCounter(source, target, pSkill);
3078  break;
3079  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE:
3080  HandleDodge(source, target, pSkill);
3081  break;
3082  default:
3083  // Cancellations occur based on knockback or damage later
3084  break;
3085  }
3086  }
3087  }
3088 }

3090 void SkillManager::HandleGuard(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
3091  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
3092 {
3093  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
3094  if(!tActivated)
3095  {
3096  return;
3097  }
3098 
3099  int8_t activationID = tActivated->GetActivationID();
3100  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetDefensible())
3101  {
3102  auto server = mServer.lock();
3103  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3104  auto tSkillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(tActivated->GetSkillID());
3105  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
3106  {
3107  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
3108  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SPIN:
3109  if(tActivated->GetChargedTime() <= pSkill->Activated->GetExecutionTime())
3110  {
3111  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_GUARDED;
3112  target.GuardModifier = tSkillData->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage()->GetModifier1();
3113  ExecuteSkill(target.EntityState, activationID, (int64_t)source->GetEntityID());
3114  return;
3115  }
3116  break;
3117  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
3119  break;
3120  default:
3121  break;
3122  }
3123  }
3124 
3125  CancelSkill(target.EntityState, tActivated->GetActivationID());
3126 }

3134  return;

3136

3138  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetDefensible())
3139  {
3140  auto server = mServer.lock();

3142  auto tSkillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(tActivated->GetSkillID());

3168 void SkillManager::HandleDodge(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,

3170 {

3172  if(!tActivated)
3173  {
3174  return;
3175  }

3183  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
3184  {
3185  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SHOT:
3186  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RAPID:
3187  if(tActivated->GetChargedTime() <= pSkill->Activated->GetExecutionTime())

3190  target.Damage1Type = target.Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_MISS;
3191  target.HitAvoided = true;

3193  return;

3195  default:

3197  }
3198  }
3199 
3200  CancelSkill(target.EntityState, activationID);

3202 
3203 std::set<uint32_t> SkillManager::HandleStatusEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
3204  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
3205  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
3206 {
3207  std::set<uint32_t> cancelOnKill;
3208 
3209  // Gather status effects from the skill
3210  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, double> addStatusMap;
3211  std::unordered_map<uint32_t,
3212  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiAddStatusTbl>> addStatusDefs;
3213  for(auto addStatus : pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
3214  {
3215  uint32_t effectID = addStatus->GetStatusID();
3216  if(!addStatus->GetOnKnockback() || (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK) != 0)
3217  {
3218  addStatusMap[effectID] = (double)addStatus->GetSuccessRate();
3219  addStatusDefs[effectID] = addStatus;
3220  }
3221  }
3222 
3223  auto sourceCalc = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
3224 
3225  // If a knockback occurred, add bonus knockback status effects from tokusei
3226  if((target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK) != 0)
3227  {
3228  for(auto addStatus : mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectMap(source,
3229  TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_STATUS_ADD, sourceCalc))
3230  {
3231  if(addStatusMap.find((uint32_t)addStatus.first) != addStatusMap.end())
3232  {
3233  addStatusMap[(uint32_t)addStatus.first] += addStatus.second;
3234  }
3235  else
3236  {
3237  addStatusMap[(uint32_t)addStatus.first] = addStatus.second;
3238  }
3239  }
3240  }
3241 
3242  if(addStatusMap.size() == 0)
3243  {
3244  return cancelOnKill;
3245  }
3246 
3247  auto targetCalc = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
3248 
3249  auto server = mServer.lock();
3250  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3251  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
3252 
3253  const static bool nraStatusNull = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
3254  objects::ChannelConfig>(server->GetConfig())->GetWorldSharedConfig()
3255  ->GetAutoCompressCurrency();
3256 
3257  auto statusAdjusts = tokuseiManager->GetAspectMap(source,
3258  TokuseiAspectType::STATUS_INFLICT_ADJUST, sourceCalc);
3259  auto statusNulls = tokuseiManager->GetAspectMap(target.EntityState,
3260  TokuseiAspectType::STATUS_NULL, targetCalc);
3261 
3262  for(auto statusPair : addStatusMap)
3263  {
3264  uint32_t effectID = statusPair.first;
3265 
3266  auto addStatus = addStatusDefs[effectID];
3267 
3268  // The effect can only be nullified if it could potentially add
3269  // an effect (don't null removes)
3270  bool canNull = !addStatus || addStatus->GetMinStack() != 0 ||
3271  addStatus->GetMaxStack() != 0;
3272 
3273  if(canNull &&
3274  statusNulls.find((int32_t)effectID) != statusNulls.end())
3275  {
3276  continue;
3277  }
3278 
3279  auto statusDef = definitionManager->GetStatusData(effectID);
3280  if(!statusDef) continue;
3281 
3282  uint8_t affinity = statusDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
3283  if(canNull && nraStatusNull)
3284  {
3285  // Optional server setting to nullify status effects with
3286  // an affinity type that the target could potentially NRA
3287  // (this does not take NRA shields into account since nothing
3288  // is "consumed" by this)
3289  CorrectTbl nraType = (CorrectTbl)(affinity + NRA_OFFSET);
3290  if(target.EntityState->GetNRAChance(0, nraType, targetCalc) > 0 ||
3291  target.EntityState->GetNRAChance(1, nraType, targetCalc) > 0 ||
3292  target.EntityState->GetNRAChance(2, nraType, targetCalc) > 0)
3293  {
3294  continue;
3295  }
3296  }
3297 
3298  uint8_t statusCategory = statusDef->GetCommon()->GetCategory()
3299  ->GetMainCategory();
3300 
3301  double successRate = statusPair.second;
3302 
3303  if(statusAdjusts.size() > 0)
3304  {
3305  // Boost success by direct inflict adjust
3306  double rateBoost = 0.0;
3307  auto it = statusAdjusts.find((int32_t)effectID);
3308  if(it != statusAdjusts.end())
3309  {
3310  rateBoost += it->second;
3311  }
3312 
3313  // Boost success by category inflict adjust (-category - 1)
3314  it = statusAdjusts.find((int32_t)(statusCategory * -1) - 1);
3315  if(it != statusAdjusts.end())
3316  {
3317  rateBoost += it->second;
3318  }
3319 
3320  if(rateBoost != 0.0)
3321  {
3322  successRate = successRate * (1.0 + rateBoost * 0.01);
3323  }
3324  }
3325 
3326  if(effectID == SVR_CONST.STATUS_DEATH && successRate > 50.0)
3327  {
3328  // Instant death has a hard cap at 50%
3329  successRate = 50.0;
3330  }
3331 
3332  // Check if the status effect hits
3333  if(successRate >= 100.0 || (successRate > 0.0 &&
3334  RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) <= (int32_t)(successRate * 100.0)))
3335  {
3336  // If the status was added by the skill itself, use that for
3337  // application logic, otherwise default to 1 non-replace
3338  int8_t minStack = addStatus ? addStatus->GetMinStack() : 1;
3339  int8_t maxStack = addStatus ? addStatus->GetMaxStack() : 1;
3340  bool isReplace = addStatus && addStatus->GetIsReplace();
3341 
3342  uint8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(minStack, maxStack);
3343  if(stack == 0 && !isReplace) continue;
3344 
3345  target.AddedStatuses[effectID] = std::make_pair(stack, isReplace);
3346 
3347  // Check for status T-Damage to apply at the end of the skill
3348  auto basicDef = statusDef->GetBasic();
3349  if(basicDef->GetStackType() == 1 && basicDef->GetApplicationLogic() == 0)
3350  {
3351  auto tDamage = statusDef->GetEffect()->GetDamage();
3352  if(tDamage->GetHPDamage() > 0)
3353  {
3354  uint8_t ailmentDamageType = (uint8_t)(affinity - AIL_OFFSET);
3355 
3356  // If the ailment damage type is not set yet or the type is
3357  // lower than the one assigned, set the type
3358  if(target.AilmentDamage == 0 ||
3359  ailmentDamageType < target.AilmentDamageType)
3360  {
3361  target.AilmentDamageType = ailmentDamageType;
3362  }
3363 
3364  target.AilmentDamage += tDamage->GetHPDamage() + stack;
3365 
3366  uint64_t ailmentTime = (uint64_t)((uint32_t)stack *
3367  statusDef->GetCancel()->GetDuration()) * 1000;
3368  if(ailmentTime > target.AilmentDamageTime)
3369  {
3370  target.AilmentDamageTime = ailmentTime;
3371  }
3372  }
3373  }
3374  else
3375  {
3376  auto cancelDef = statusDef->GetCancel();
3377  if(cancelDef->GetCancelTypes() & EFFECT_CANCEL_DEATH)
3378  {
3379  cancelOnKill.insert(effectID);
3380  }
3381  }
3382  }
3383  }
3384 
3385  return cancelOnKill;
3386 }
3387 
3388 void SkillManager::HandleKills(std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
3389  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
3390  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> killed)
3391 {
3392  auto server = mServer.lock();
3393  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
3394  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
3395 
3396  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
3397 
3398  // Familiarity is reduced from death (0) or same demon kills (1)
3399  // and is dependent upon familiarity type
3400  const int16_t fTypeMap[17][2] =
3401  {
3402  { -100, -5 }, // Type 0
3403  { -20, -50 }, // Type 1
3404  { -20, -20 }, // Type 2
3405  { -50, -50 }, // Type 3
3406  { -100, -100 }, // Type 4
3407  { -100, -100 }, // Type 5
3408  { -20, -20 }, // Type 6
3409  { -50, -50 }, // Type 7
3410  { -100, -100 }, // Type 8
3411  { -100, -100 }, // Type 9
3412  { -50, -100 }, // Type 10
3413  { -50, 0 }, // Type 11
3414  { -100, -100 }, // Type 12
3415  { -120, -120 }, // Type 13
3416  { 0, 0 }, // Type 14 (invalid)
3417  { 0, 0 }, // Type 15 (invalid)
3418  { -100, -100 } // Type 16
3419  };
3420 
3421  auto sourceDevilData = source->GetDevilData();
3422  uint32_t sourceDemonType = sourceDevilData
3423  ? sourceDevilData->GetBasic()->GetID() : 0;
3424  int32_t sourceDemonFType = sourceDevilData
3425  ? sourceDevilData->GetFamiliarity()->GetFamiliarityType() : 0;
3426 
3427  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int32_t> adjustments;
3428  std::list<std::shared_ptr<EnemyState>> enemiesKilled;
3429  for(auto entity : killed)
3430  {
3431  // Remove all opponents
3432  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(false, entity, nullptr);
3433 
3434  // Determine familiarity adjustments
3435  bool partnerDeath = false;
3436  uint32_t dType = 0;
3437  switch(entity->GetEntityType())
3438  {
3439  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
3440  dType = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(entity)
3441  ->GetEntity()->GetType();
3442  partnerDeath = true;
3443  break;
3444  case objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::ENEMY:
3445  {
3446  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(entity);
3447  dType = eState->GetEntity()->GetType();
3448  enemiesKilled.push_back(eState);
3449  }
3450  break;
3451  default:
3452  break;
3453  }
3454 
3455  if(dType)
3456  {
3457  std::list<std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>> adjusts;
3458  if(partnerDeath)
3459  {
3460  // Partner demon has died
3461  adjusts.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
3462  entity->GetEntityID(), fTypeMap[(size_t)sourceDemonFType][0]));
3463  }
3464 
3465  if(entity != source && sourceDemonType == dType)
3466  {
3467  // Same demon type killed
3468  adjusts.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
3469  source->GetEntityID(), fTypeMap[(size_t)sourceDemonFType][1]));
3470  }
3471 
3472  for(auto aPair : adjusts)
3473  {
3474  if(adjustments.find(aPair.first) == adjustments.end())
3475  {
3476  adjustments[aPair.first] = aPair.second;
3477  }
3478  else
3479  {
3480  adjustments[aPair.first] = (int32_t)(
3481  adjustments[aPair.first] + aPair.second);
3482  }
3483  }
3484  }
3485  }
3486 
3487  // Apply familiarity adjustments
3488  for(auto aPair : adjustments)
3489  {
3490  auto demonClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
3491  GetEntityClient(aPair.first);
3492  if(!demonClient) continue;
3493 
3494  characterManager->UpdateFamiliarity(demonClient, aPair.second, true);
3495  }
3496 
3497  if(enemiesKilled.size() > 0)
3498  {
3499  auto sourceClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
3500  GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
3501  auto sourceState = sourceClient ? sourceClient->GetClientState() : nullptr;
3502 
3503  // Gather all enemy entity IDs
3504  std::list<int32_t> enemyIDs;
3505  for(auto eState : enemiesKilled)
3506  {
3507  zone->RemoveEntity(eState->GetEntityID(), 1);
3508  enemyIDs.push_back(eState->GetEntityID());
3509  }
3510 
3511  zoneManager->RemoveEntitiesFromZone(zone, enemyIDs, 4, true);
3512 
3513  // Transform enemies into loot bodies and gather quest kills
3514  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<LootBoxState>,
3515  std::shared_ptr<EnemyState>> lStates;
3516  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, int32_t> questKills;
3517  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> encounterGroups;
3518  for(auto eState : enemiesKilled)
3519  {
3520  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
3521 
3522  auto lootBody = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
3523  lootBody->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::BODY);
3524  lootBody->SetEnemy(enemy);
3525 
3526  auto lState = std::make_shared<LootBoxState>(lootBody);
3527  lState->SetCurrentX(eState->GetDestinationX());
3528  lState->SetCurrentY(eState->GetDestinationY());
3529  lState->SetCurrentRotation(eState->GetDestinationRotation());
3530  lState->SetEntityID(server->GetNextEntityID());
3531  lStates[lState] = eState;
3532 
3533  zone->AddLootBox(lState);
3534 
3535  uint32_t dType = eState->GetEntity()->GetType();
3536  if(sourceState && sourceState->QuestTargetEnemiesContains(dType))
3537  {
3538  if(questKills.find(dType) == questKills.end())
3539  {
3540  questKills[dType] = 1;
3541  }
3542  else
3543  {
3544  questKills[dType] = (questKills[dType] + 1);
3545  }
3546  }
3547 
3548  encounterGroups[enemy->GetEncounterID()] = enemy->GetSpawnGroupID();
3549  }
3550 
3551  // For each loot body generate and send loot and show the body
3552  // After this schedule all of the bodies for cleanup after their
3553  // loot time passes
3554  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
3555  int16_t luck = source->GetLUCK();
3556 
3557  auto firstClient = zConnections.size() > 0 ? zConnections.front() : nullptr;
3558  auto sourceParty = sourceState ? sourceState->GetParty() : nullptr;
3559  std::set<int32_t> sourcePartyMembers = sourceParty
3560  ? sourceParty->GetMemberIDs() : std::set<int32_t>();
3561 
3562  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> lootTimeEntityIDs;
3563  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> delayedLootEntityIDs;
3564  for(auto lPair : lStates)
3565  {
3566  auto lState = lPair.first;
3567  auto eState = lPair.second;
3568 
3569  int32_t lootEntityID = lState->GetEntityID();
3570 
3571  auto lootBody = lState->GetEntity();
3572  auto enemy = lootBody->GetEnemy();
3573  auto spawn = enemy->GetSpawnSource();
3574  auto damageSources = enemy->GetDamageSources();
3575 
3576  auto drops = GetItemDrops(enemy->GetType(), spawn);
3577 
3578  // Create loot based off drops and send if any was added
3579  uint64_t lootTime = 0;
3580  if(sourceState && characterManager->CreateLootFromDrops(lootBody, drops, luck))
3581  {
3582  // Bodies remain lootable for 120 seconds with loot
3583  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
3584 
3585  std::set<int32_t> validLooterIDs = { sourceState->GetWorldCID() };
3586  if(sourceParty)
3587  {
3588  bool timedAdjust = true;
3589  switch(sourceParty->GetDropRule())
3590  {
3591  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::DAMAGE_RACE:
3592  {
3593  // Highest damage dealer member wins
3594  std::map<uint64_t, int32_t> damageMap;
3595  for(auto pair : damageSources)
3596  {
3597  damageMap[pair.second] = pair.first;
3598  }
3599 
3600  if(damageMap.size() > 0)
3601  {
3602  validLooterIDs = { damageMap.rbegin()->second };
3603  }
3604  }
3605  break;
3606  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::RANDOM_LOOT:
3607  {
3608  // Randomly pick a member
3609  auto it = sourcePartyMembers.begin();
3610  size_t offset = (size_t)RNG(uint16_t, 0,
3611  (uint16_t)(sourcePartyMembers.size() - 1));
3612  std::advance(it, offset);
3613 
3614  validLooterIDs = { *it };
3615  }
3616  break;
3617  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::FREE_LOOT:
3618  {
3619  // Every member is valid
3620  validLooterIDs = sourcePartyMembers;
3621  timedAdjust = false;
3622  }
3623  break;
3624  default:
3625  break;
3626  }
3627 
3628  if(timedAdjust)
3629  {
3630  // The last 60 seconds are fair game for everyone
3631  uint64_t delayedlootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 60000000);
3632  delayedLootEntityIDs[delayedlootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
3633  }
3634  }
3635 
3636  lootBody->SetValidLooterIDs(validLooterIDs);
3637  }
3638  else
3639  {
3640  // Bodies remain lootable for 10 seconds without loot
3641  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 10000000);
3642  }
3643 
3644  lootBody->SetLootTime(lootTime);
3645  lootTimeEntityIDs[lootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
3646 
3647  if(firstClient)
3648  {
3649  zoneManager->SendLootBoxData(firstClient, lState, eState,
3650  true, true);
3651  }
3652  }
3653 
3654  for(auto pair : lootTimeEntityIDs)
3655  {
3656  zoneManager->ScheduleEntityRemoval(pair.first, zone, pair.second, 13);
3657  }
3658 
3659  for(auto pair : delayedLootEntityIDs)
3660  {
3661  ScheduleFreeLoot(pair.first, zone, pair.second, sourcePartyMembers);
3662  }
3663 
3664  // Update quest kill counts
3665  if(sourceClient && questKills.size() > 0)
3666  {
3667  server->GetEventManager()->UpdateQuestKillCount(sourceClient,
3668  questKills);
3669  }
3670 
3671  // Perform defeat actions for all empty encounters
3672  HandleEncounterDefeat(source, zone, encounterGroups);
3673 
3674  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
3675 
3676  // Loop through one last time and send all XP gained
3677  for(auto eState : enemiesKilled)
3678  {
3679  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
3680  HandleKillXP(enemy, zone);
3681  }
3682  }
3683 }
3684 
3685 void SkillManager::HandleKillXP(const std::shared_ptr<objects::Enemy>& enemy,
3686  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone)
3687 {
3688  auto spawn = enemy->GetSpawnSource();
3689 
3690  int64_t totalXP = 0;
3691  if(spawn && spawn->GetXP() >= 0)
3692  {
3693  totalXP = spawn->GetXP();
3694  }
3695  else
3696  {
3697  // All non-spawn enemies have a calculated value
3698  totalXP = (int64_t)(enemy->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel() * 20);
3699  }
3700 
3701  if(totalXP <= 0)
3702  {
3703  return;
3704  }
3705  else
3706  {
3707  // Apply global XP bonus
3708  const static float globalXPBonus = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
3709  objects::ChannelConfig>(mServer.lock()->GetConfig())
3710  ->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetXPBonus();
3711 
3712  totalXP = (int64_t)((double)totalXP * (double)(1.f + globalXPBonus));
3713 
3714  // Apply zone XP multiplier
3715  totalXP = (int64_t)((double)totalXP *
3716  (double)zone->GetDefinition()->GetXPMultiplier());
3717  }
3718 
3719  // Determine XP distribution
3720  // -Individuals/single parties gain max XP
3721  // -Multiple individuals/parties have XP distributed by damage dealt
3722  // -Party members gain alloted XP - ((number of members in the zone - 1) * 10%)
3723  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint64_t> playerDamage;
3724  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint64_t> partyDamage;
3725  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, std::shared_ptr<objects::Party>> parties;
3726 
3727  uint64_t totalDamage = 0;
3728  auto damageSources = enemy->GetDamageSources();
3729  for(auto damagePair : damageSources)
3730  {
3731  totalDamage = (uint64_t)(totalDamage + damagePair.second);
3732  }
3733 
3734  auto server = mServer.lock();
3735  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
3736  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
3737 
3738  std::unordered_map<int32_t,
3739  std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>> clientMap;
3740  for(auto damagePair : damageSources)
3741  {
3742  auto c = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(damagePair.first, true);
3743  if(c)
3744  {
3745  clientMap[damagePair.first] = c;
3746 
3747  uint64_t dmg = damagePair.second;
3748  auto s = c->GetClientState();
3749  auto party = s->GetParty();
3750  if(party)
3751  {
3752  uint32_t partyID = party->GetID();
3753  if(partyDamage.find(partyID) == partyDamage.end())
3754  {
3755  parties[partyID] = party;
3756  partyDamage[partyID] = dmg;
3757  }
3758  else
3759  {
3760  partyDamage[partyID] = partyDamage[partyID] + dmg;
3761  }
3762  }
3763  else
3764  {
3765  if(s->GetCharacterState()->GetZone() == zone)
3766  {
3767  playerDamage[s->GetWorldCID()] = dmg;
3768  }
3769  else
3770  {
3771  // Since the player is not still in the zone,
3772  // reduce the total damage since the player will not
3773  // receive any XP
3774  totalDamage = (totalDamage - dmg);
3775  }
3776  }
3777  }
3778  }
3779 
3780  // Find all party members that are active in the zone
3781  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, std::set<int32_t>> membersInZone;
3782  for(auto pPair : partyDamage)
3783  {
3784  for(int32_t memberID : parties[pPair.first]->GetMemberIDs())
3785  {
3786  auto c = clientMap[memberID];
3787  if(c == nullptr)
3788  {
3789  c = server->GetManagerConnection()
3790  ->GetEntityClient(memberID, true);
3791  clientMap[memberID] = c;
3792  }
3793 
3794  if(c)
3795  {
3796  auto s = c->GetClientState();
3797  if(s->GetCharacterState()->GetZone() == zone)
3798  {
3799  membersInZone[pPair.first].insert(memberID);
3800  }
3801  }
3802  }
3803 
3804  // No party members are in the zone
3805  if(membersInZone[pPair.first].size() == 0)
3806  {
3807  // Since no one in the party is still in the zone,
3808  // reduce the total damage since no member will
3809  // receive any XP
3810  totalDamage = (totalDamage - pPair.second);
3811  }
3812  }
3813 
3814  // Calculate the XP gains based on damage dealt by players
3815  // and parties still in the zone
3816  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int64_t> xpMap;
3817  for(auto pair : playerDamage)
3818  {
3819  xpMap[pair.first] = (int64_t)ceil((double)totalXP *
3820  (double)pair.second / (double)totalDamage);
3821  }
3822 
3823  for(auto pair : membersInZone)
3824  {
3825  double xp = (double)totalXP *
3826  (double)partyDamage[pair.first] / (double)totalDamage;
3827 
3828  int64_t partyXP = (int64_t)ceil(xp * 1.0 -
3829  ((double)(membersInZone.size() - 1) * 0.1));
3830 
3831  for(auto memberID : pair.second)
3832  {
3833  xpMap[memberID] = partyXP;
3834  }
3835  }
3836 
3837  // Apply the adjusted XP values to each player
3838  for(auto xpPair : xpMap)
3839  {
3840  auto c = clientMap[xpPair.first];
3841  if(c == nullptr) continue;
3842 
3843  auto s = c->GetClientState();
3844  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>>
3845  clientStates = { s->GetCharacterState() };
3846  clientStates.push_back(s->GetDemonState());
3847  for(auto cState : clientStates)
3848  {
3849  // Demons only get XP if they are alive, characters get
3850  // it regardless
3851  if(cState->Ready() && (cState == s->GetCharacterState() ||
3852  cState->IsAlive()))
3853  {
3854  int64_t finalXP = (int64_t)ceil((double)xpPair.second *
3855  ((double)cState->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::RATE_XP)
3856  * 0.01));
3857 
3858  characterManager->ExperienceGain(c, (uint64_t)finalXP,
3859  cState->GetEntityID());
3860  }
3861  }
3862  }
3863 }
3864 
3865 void SkillManager::HandleEncounterDefeat(const std::shared_ptr<
3866  ActiveEntityState> source, const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
3867  const std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t>& encounterGroups)
3868 {
3869  if(encounterGroups.size() == 0 || (encounterGroups.size() == 1 &&
3870  encounterGroups.find(0) != encounterGroups.end()))
3871  {
3872  // Nothing to do
3873  return;
3874  }
3875 
3876  auto server = mServer.lock();
3877  auto actionManager = server->GetActionManager();
3878  auto sourceClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
3879  GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
3880  for(auto ePair : encounterGroups)
3881  {
3882  if(!ePair.first) continue;
3883 
3884  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActionSpawn> defeatActionSource;
3885  if(zone->EncounterDefeated(ePair.first, defeatActionSource))
3886  {
3887  // If the defeatActionSource has actions, those override the group's default
3888  if(defeatActionSource && defeatActionSource->DefeatActionsCount() > 0)
3889  {
3890  actionManager->PerformActions(sourceClient,
3891  defeatActionSource->GetDefeatActions(), source->GetEntityID(),
3892  zone, ePair.first);
3893  }
3894  else
3895  {
3896  auto group = zone->GetDefinition()->GetSpawnGroups(ePair.second);
3897  if(group && group->DefeatActionsCount() > 0)
3898  {
3899  actionManager->PerformActions(sourceClient,
3900  group->GetDefeatActions(), source->GetEntityID(), zone,
3901  ePair.first);
3902  }
3903  }
3904  }
3905  }
3906 }

3908 void SkillManager::HandleNegotiations(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
3909  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
3910  const std::list<std::pair<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>, uint8_t>> talkDone)
3911 {
3912  auto server = mServer.lock();
3913  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
3914  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
3915  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
3916 
3917  // Gather all enemy IDs that will be removed
3918  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> encounterGroups;
3919  std::unordered_map<int32_t, std::list<int32_t>> removedEnemies;
3920  for(auto pair : talkDone)
3921  {
3922  if(pair.second != TALK_REJECT)
3923  {
3924  int32_t removeMode = 0;
3925  switch(pair.second)
3926  {
3927  case TALK_JOIN:
3928  case TALK_JOIN_2:
3929  removeMode = 5;
3930  break;
3931  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM:
3932  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2:
3933  removeMode = 6;
3934  break;
3935  case TALK_LEAVE:
3936  removeMode = 8;
3937  break;
3938  default:
3939  break;
3940  }
3941 
3942  // Get encounter information
3943  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(pair.first);
3944  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
3945  if(enemy && enemy->GetEncounterID())
3946  {
3947  encounterGroups[enemy->GetEncounterID()] = enemy->GetSpawnGroupID();
3948  }
3949 
3950  // Remove all opponents
3951  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(false, pair.first, nullptr);
3952  zone->RemoveEntity(pair.first->GetEntityID(), 1);
3953  removedEnemies[removeMode].push_back(pair.first->GetEntityID());
3954  }
3955  }
3956 
3957  for(auto pair : removedEnemies)
3958  {
3959  zoneManager->RemoveEntitiesFromZone(zone, pair.second, pair.first, true);
3960  }
3961 
3962  auto sourceClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
3963  GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
3964  auto sourceState = sourceClient ? sourceClient->GetClientState() : nullptr;
3965  if(!sourceState)
3966  {
3967  // Not a player, flush connections and stop
3968  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
3969  return;
3970  }
3971 
3972  // Handle the results of negotiations that result in an enemy being removed
3973  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<LootBoxState>,
3974  std::shared_ptr<EnemyState>> lStates;
3975  for(auto pair : talkDone)
3976  {
3977  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(pair.first);
3978  if(pair.second != TALK_LEAVE && pair.second != TALK_REJECT)
3979  {
3980  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
3981 
3983  std::shared_ptr<objects::LootBox> lBox;
3984  switch(pair.second)
3985  {
3986  case TALK_JOIN:
3987  case TALK_JOIN_2:
3988  {
3989  lBox = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
3990  lBox->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::EGG);
3991  lBox->SetEnemy(enemy);
3992 
3993  auto demonLoot = std::make_shared<objects::Loot>();
3994  demonLoot->SetType(enemy->GetType());
3995  demonLoot->SetCount(1);
3996  lBox->SetLoot(0, demonLoot);
3997  }
3998  break;
3999  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM:
4000  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2:
4001  {
4002  lBox = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
4003  lBox->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::GIFT_BOX);
4004  lBox->SetEnemy(enemy);
4005 
4006  auto drops = GetItemDrops(enemy->GetType(),
4007  enemy->GetSpawnSource(), true);
4008  characterManager->CreateLootFromDrops(lBox, drops,
4009  source->GetLUCK(), true);
4010  }
4011  break;
4012  default:
4013  break;
4014  }
4015 
4016  if(lBox)
4017  {
4018  auto lState = std::make_shared<LootBoxState>(lBox);
4019  lState->SetCurrentX(eState->GetDestinationX());
4020  lState->SetCurrentY(eState->GetDestinationY());
4021  lState->SetCurrentRotation(eState->GetDestinationRotation());
4022  lState->SetEntityID(server->GetNextEntityID());
4023  lStates[lState] = eState;
4024 
4025  zone->AddLootBox(lState);
4026  }
4027  }
4028  }
4029 
4030  // Show each look box and schedule them for cleanup after their
4031  // loot time passes
4032  if(lStates.size() > 0)
4033  {
4034  // Spawned boxes remain lootable for 120 seconds
4035  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
4036 
4037  auto firstClient = zConnections.size() > 0 ? zConnections.front() : nullptr;
4038  auto sourceParty = sourceState->GetParty();
4039  std::set<int32_t> sourcePartyMembers = sourceParty
4040  ? sourceParty->GetMemberIDs() : std::set<int32_t>();
4041 
4042  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> lootTimeEntityIDs;
4043  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> delayedLootEntityIDs;
4044  for(auto lPair : lStates)
4045  {
4046  auto lState = lPair.first;
4047  auto eState = lPair.second;
4048 
4049  auto lootBox = lState->GetEntity();
4050  lootBox->InsertValidLooterIDs(sourceState->GetWorldCID());
4051 
4052  uint64_t lootTime = 0;
4053  uint64_t delayedLootTime = 0;
4054  if(lootBox->GetType() == objects::LootBox::Type_t::EGG)
4055  {
4056  // Demon eggs remain lootable for 300 seconds
4057  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 300000000);
4058 
4059  // Free loot starts 120 seconds in
4060  delayedLootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
4061  }
4062  else
4063  {
4064  // Gift boxes remain lootable for 120 seconds
4065  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
4066 
4067  if(sourceParty)
4068  {
4069  if(sourceParty->GetDropRule() ==
4070  objects::Party::DropRule_t::FREE_LOOT)
4071  {
4072  lootBox->SetValidLooterIDs(sourcePartyMembers);
4073  }
4074  else
4075  {
4076  // Free loot starts 60 seconds in
4077  delayedLootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 60000000);
4078  }
4079  }
4080  }
4081  lootBox->SetLootTime(lootTime);
4082 
4083  if(firstClient)
4084  {
4085  zoneManager->SendLootBoxData(firstClient, lState, eState,
4086  true, true);
4087  }
4088 
4089  int32_t lootEntityID = lState->GetEntityID();
4090  lootTimeEntityIDs[lootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
4091 
4092  if(sourceParty && delayedLootTime)
4093  {
4094  delayedLootEntityIDs[delayedLootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
4095  }
4096  }
4097 
4098  for(auto pair : lootTimeEntityIDs)
4099  {
4100  zoneManager->ScheduleEntityRemoval(pair.first, zone, pair.second, 13);
4101  }
4102 
4103  for(auto pair : delayedLootEntityIDs)
4104  {
4105  ScheduleFreeLoot(pair.first, zone, pair.second, sourcePartyMembers);
4106  }
4107  }
4108 
4109  if(encounterGroups.size() > 0)
4110  {
4111  HandleEncounterDefeat(source, zone, encounterGroups);
4112  }
4113 
4114  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
4115 }

4117 void SkillManager::HandleSkillLearning(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> entity,
4118  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
4119 {
4120  double iMod1 = (double)pSkill->Definition->GetAcquisition()->GetInheritanceModifier();
4121 
4122  auto dState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(entity);
4123  if(!dState || !dState->Ready() || iMod1 <= 0)
4124  {
4125  return;
4126  }
4127 
4128  bool isSource = pSkill->Activated->GetSourceEntity() == entity;
4129  auto learningSkills = dState->GetLearningSkills(pSkill->EffectiveAffinity);
4130  if(learningSkills.size() == 0)
4131  {
4132  return;
4133  }
4134 
4135  auto server = mServer.lock();
4136  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
4137  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
4138 
4139  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create();
4140 
4141  std::list<std::pair<uint32_t, int16_t>> updateMap;
4142  for(auto iSkill : learningSkills)
4143  {
4144  auto iSkillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(iSkill->GetSkill());
4145  auto iMod2 = iSkillData
4146  ? (double)iSkillData->GetAcquisition()->GetInheritanceModifier() : 0.0;
4147  if(iMod2 > 0.0)
4148  {
4149  uint16_t updateProgress = 0;
4150  if(isSource)
4151  {
4152  updateProgress = (uint16_t)floor(pow((iMod1 * 40.0)/iMod2, 2) * 0.25);
4153  }
4154  else
4155  {
4156  updateProgress = (uint16_t)floor(pow((iMod1 * 40.0)/iMod2, 2));
4157  }
4158 
4159  if(updateProgress > 0)
4160  {
4161  int16_t progress = dState->UpdateLearningSkill(iSkill, updateProgress);
4162  updateMap.push_back(std::pair<uint32_t, int16_t>(iSkill->GetSkill(), progress));
4163 
4164  dbChanges->Update(iSkill);
4165  }
4166  }
4167  }
4168 
4169  if(updateMap.size() > 0)
4170  {
4171  auto dClient = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(dState->GetEntityID(), false);
4172  if(dClient)
4173  {
4174  libcomp::Packet p;
4175  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_INHERIT_SKILL_UPDATED);
4176  p.WriteS32Little(dState->GetEntityID());
4177  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)updateMap.size());
4178  for(auto pair : updateMap)
4179  {
4180  p.WriteU32Little(pair.first);
4181  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)pair.second);
4182  }
4183 
4184  dClient->SendPacket(p);
4185  }
4186 
4187  dState->RefreshLearningSkills(pSkill->EffectiveAffinity, definitionManager);
4188 
4189  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
4190  }
4191 }
4192 
4193 void SkillManager::HandleDurabilityDamage(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> entity,
4194  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
4195 {
4196  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(entity);
4197  auto character = cState ? cState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
4198  if(!cState || !character || !cState->Ready())
4199  {
4200  return;
4201  }
4202 
4203  const size_t WEAPON_IDX = (size_t)objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_WEAPON;
4204 
4205  auto server = mServer.lock();
4206  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
4207 
4208  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(cState->GetEntityID(), false);
4209  if(!client)
4210  {
4211  return;
4212  }
4213 
4214  bool isSource = pSkill->Activated->GetSourceEntity() == entity;
4215  if(isSource)
4216  {
4217  // Decrease weapon durability by value * 2 (do not scale for target count hit)
4218  std::shared_ptr<objects::Item> weapon = character->GetEquippedItems(WEAPON_IDX).Get();
4219  if(!weapon)
4220  {
4221  return;
4222  }
4223 
4224  uint16_t weaponDamage = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetBreakData()->GetWeapon();
4225  double knowledgeRank = (double)pSkill->KnowledgeRank;
4226 
4227  int32_t durabilityLoss = weaponDamage * 2;
4228  if(knowledgeRank)
4229  {
4230  // Decrease damage by a maximum of approximately 30%
4232  durabilityLoss = (int32_t)floor(pow(knowledgeRank, 2) / 450.0 -
4233  (0.4275 * knowledgeRank) + (double)durabilityLoss);
4234  }
4235 
4236  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, weapon, -durabilityLoss);
4237  }
4238  else
4239  {
4240  // Decrease armor durability on everything equipped but the weapon by value
4241  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>> otherEquipment;
4242  for(size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++)
4243  {
4244  if(i != WEAPON_IDX)
4245  {
4246  auto equip = character->GetEquippedItems(i).Get();
4247  if(equip)
4248  {
4249  otherEquipment.push_back(equip);
4250  }
4251  }
4252  }
4253 
4254  if(otherEquipment.size() == 0)
4255  {
4256  return;
4257  }
4258 
4259  uint16_t armorDamage = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetBreakData()->GetArmor();
4260 
4261  double survivalRank = (double)cState->GetExpertiseRank(
4262  server->GetDefinitionManager(), EXPERTISE_SURVIVAL);
4263 
4264  int32_t durabilityLoss = (int32_t)armorDamage;
4265  if(survivalRank)
4266  {
4267  // Decrease damage to a maximum of approximately 60%
4269  durabilityLoss = (int32_t)ceil(((double)durabilityLoss - 1.0) *
4270  (1.0 + ((0.002 * pow(survivalRank, 2)) - (0.215 * survivalRank)) / 10.0));
4271  }
4272 
4273  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>, int32_t> equipMap;
4274  for(auto equip : otherEquipment)
4275  {
4276  equipMap[equip] = -durabilityLoss;
4277  }
4278 
4279  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, equipMap);
4280  }
4281 }

4283 bool SkillManager::ToggleSwitchSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
4284  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
4285  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx)
4286 {
4287  auto server = mServer.lock();
4288  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
4289  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
4290 
4291  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
4292  auto skillID = activated->GetSkillID();
4293  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
4294 
4295  bool toggleOn = false;
4296  if(source->ActiveSwitchSkillsContains(skillID))
4297  {
4298  source->RemoveActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
4299  }
4300  else
4301  {
4302  source->InsertActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
4303  toggleOn = true;
4304  }
4305 
4306  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
4307 
4308  if(client)
4309  {

4315

4317 
4318  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(source, true,
4319  std::set<int32_t>{ source->GetEntityID() });
4320  characterManager->RecalculateStats(source, client);
4321 
4322  client->FlushOutgoing();
4323  }
4324  else
4325  {
4326  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(source, false);
4327  source->RecalculateStats(definitionManager);
4328  }
4329 
4330  return true;
4331 }
4332 
4333 bool SkillManager::CalculateDamage(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
4334  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
4335 {
4336  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
4337 
4338  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
4339 
4340  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage();
4341  auto formula = damageData->GetFormula();
4342 
4343  bool isHeal = formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL
4344  || formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC
4345  || formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT;
4346  bool isSimpleDamage = formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE;
4347 
4348  uint16_t mod1 = damageData->GetModifier1();
4349  uint16_t mod2 = damageData->GetModifier2();
4350 
4351  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4352  {
4353  if(target.HitAvoided) continue;
4354 
4355  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
4356  bool effectiveHeal = isHeal || target.HitAbsorb;
4357 
4358  int8_t minDamageLevel = -1;
4359  if(!effectiveHeal)
4360  {
4361  // If not healing, determine if the calculated critical level will
4362  // result in minimum damage
4363  for(double damageMin : tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(
4364  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_MIN, targetState))
4365  {
4366  if(minDamageLevel < (int8_t)damageMin)
4367  {
4368  minDamageLevel = (int8_t)damageMin;
4369  }
4370  }
4371  }
4372 
4373  bool minAdjust = minDamageLevel > -1;
4374  switch(formula)
4375  {
4376  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE:
4377  return true;
4378  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL:
4379  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE:
4380  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_COUNTER:
4381  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL:
4382  {
4383  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
4384 
4385  uint8_t critLevel = !isHeal ? GetCritLevel(source, target, pSkill) : 0;
4386 
4387  CorrectTbl resistCorrectType = (CorrectTbl)(skill.EffectiveAffinity + RES_OFFSET);
4388 
4389  float resist = (float)
4390  (targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)resistCorrectType) * 0.01);
4391  if(target.HitAbsorb)
4392  {
4393  // Resistance is not applied during absorption
4394  resist = 0;
4395  }
4396 
4397  // Calculate both damage types
4398  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Normal(source, target, pSkill,
4399  mod1, target.Damage1Type, skill.EffectiveAffinity, resist,
4400  critLevel, isHeal);
4401  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Normal(source, target, pSkill,
4402  mod2, target.Damage2Type, skill.EffectiveAffinity, resist,
4403  critLevel, isHeal);
4404 
4405  // Always disable min adjust as it will be done here
4406  minAdjust = false;
4407 
4408  if(minDamageLevel >= (int8_t)critLevel)
4409  {
4410  // If the min damage level is equal to or greater than the
4411  // critical level, adjust to minimum damage
4412  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 ? 1 : 0;
4413  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 ? 1 : 0;
4414  }
4415 
4416  // Set crit-level adjustment flags
4417  switch(critLevel)
4418  {
4419  case 1:
4420  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_CRITICAL;
4421  break;
4422  case 2:
4423  if(target.Damage1 > 30000 ||
4424  target.Damage2 > 30000)
4425  {
4426  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_INTENSIVE_BREAK;
4427  }
4428  else
4429  {
4430  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_LIMIT_BREAK;
4431  }
4432  break;
4433  default:
4434  break;
4435  }
4436 
4437  // Set resistence flags, if not healing
4438  if(!effectiveHeal)
4439  {
4440  if(resist >= 0.5f)
4441  {
4442  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_PROTECT;
4443  }
4444  else if(resist <= -0.5f)
4445  {
4446  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_WEAKPOINT;
4447  }
4448  }
4449 
4450  // Determine pursuit/tech damage
4451  if(!effectiveHeal && !isSimpleDamage && target.Damage1 > 0)
4452  {
4453  int32_t pursuitRate = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
4454  source, TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_RATE, calcState));
4455  int32_t pursuitPow = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
4456  source, TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_POWER, calcState));
4457  if(pursuitPow > 0.0 && pursuitRate > 0.0 &&
4458  (pursuitRate >= 100.0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 100) <= pursuitRate))
4459  {
4460  target.PursuitAffinity = skill.EffectiveAffinity;
4461 
4462  // Take the lowest value applied tokusei affinity override if one exists
4463  auto affinityOverrides = tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(source,
4464  TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_AFFINITY_OVERRIDE);
4465  if(affinityOverrides.size() > 0)
4466  {
4467  affinityOverrides.sort();
4468  target.PursuitAffinity = (uint8_t)affinityOverrides.front();
4469  }
4470 
4471  // If the result is weapon affinity, match it
4472  if(target.PursuitAffinity == 1)
4473  {
4474  target.PursuitAffinity = skill.WeaponAffinity;
4475  }
4476 
4477  // If the pursuit affinity does not match the effective affinity,
4478  // the damage must be recalculated first
4479  if(target.PursuitAffinity != skill.EffectiveAffinity)
4480  {
4481  // Check NRA for pursuit affinity and stop if it is prevented
4482  if(!GetNRAResult(target, skill, target.PursuitAffinity, true))
4483  {
4484  // Calculate the new enemy resistence and determine damage
4485  resistCorrectType = (CorrectTbl)(
4486  target.PursuitAffinity + RES_OFFSET);
4487 
4488  resist = (float)(targetState->GetCorrectTbl(
4489  (size_t)resistCorrectType) * 0.01);
4490 
4491  uint8_t damageType;
4492  target.PursuitDamage = CalculateDamage_Normal(source, target,
4493  pSkill, mod1, damageType, target.PursuitAffinity, resist,
4494  critLevel, false);
4495  }
4496  }
4497  else
4498  {
4499  target.PursuitDamage = target.Damage1;
4500  }
4501 
4502  if(target.PursuitDamage > 0)
4503  {
4504  // Apply the rate adjustment
4505  target.PursuitDamage = (int32_t)floor(
4506  (double)target.PursuitDamage * pursuitPow * 0.01);
4507 
4508  // Adjust for 100% limit
4509  if(target.PursuitDamage > target.Damage1)
4510  {
4511  target.PursuitDamage = target.Damage1;
4512  }
4513  }
4514  }
4515 
4516  int32_t techRate = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
4517  source, TokuseiAspectType::TECH_ATTACK_RATE, calcState));
4518  double techPow = floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
4519  source, TokuseiAspectType::TECH_ATTACK_POWER, calcState));
4520  if(techPow > 0.0 && techRate > 0 &&
4521  (techRate >= 100 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 100) <= techRate))
4522  {
4523  // Calculate relative damage
4524  target.TechnicalDamage = (int32_t)floor(
4525  (double)target.Damage1 * techPow * 0.01);
4526 
4527  // Apply limits
4528  if(critLevel == 2)
4529  {
4530  // Cap at LB limit
4531  int32_t maxLB = (int32_t)(30000 + floor(
4532  tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
4533  TokuseiAspectType::LIMIT_BREAK_MAX, calcState)));
4534 
4535  if(target.TechnicalDamage > maxLB)
4536  {
4537  target.TechnicalDamage = maxLB;
4538  }
4539  }
4540  else if(target.TechnicalDamage > 9999)
4541  {
4542  target.TechnicalDamage = 9999;
4543  }
4544  }
4545  }
4546  }
4547  break;
4548  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_STATIC:
4549  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC:
4550  if(minDamageLevel == -1)
4551  {
4552  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Static(
4553  mod1, target.Damage1Type);
4554  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Static(
4555  mod2, target.Damage2Type);
4556  }
4557  break;
4558  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_PERCENT:
4559  if(minDamageLevel == -1)
4560  {
4561  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
4562  mod1, target.Damage1Type,
4563  target.EntityState->GetCoreStats()->GetHP());
4564  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
4565  mod2, target.Damage2Type,
4566  target.EntityState->GetCoreStats()->GetMP());
4567  }
4568  break;
4569  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_SOURCE_PERCENT:
4570  if(minDamageLevel == -1)
4571  {
4572  //Calculate using pre-cost values
4573  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
4574  mod1, target.Damage1Type,
4575  static_cast<int32_t>(source->GetCoreStats()->GetHP() +
4576  skill.Activated->GetHPCost()));
4577  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
4578  mod2, target.Damage2Type,
4579  static_cast<int32_t>(source->GetCoreStats()->GetMP() +
4580  skill.Activated->GetMPCost()));
4581  }
4582  break;
4583  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_MAX_PERCENT:
4584  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT:
4585  if(minDamageLevel == -1)
4586  {
4587  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_MaxPercent(
4588  mod1, target.Damage1Type, target.EntityState->GetMaxHP());
4589  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_MaxPercent(
4590  mod2, target.Damage2Type, target.EntityState->GetMaxMP());
4591  }
4592  break;
4593  default:
4594  LOG_ERROR(libcomp::String("Unknown damage formula type encountered: %1\n")
4595  .Arg((uint8_t)formula));
4596  return false;
4597  }
4598 
4599  // Apply minimum adjustment for anything that hasn't already
4600  if(minAdjust)
4601  {
4602  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 ? 1 : 0;
4603  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 ? 1 : 0;
4604  }
4605 
4606  // Reduce for AOE and make sure at least 1 damage was dealt to each specified type
4607  float aoeReduction = (float)damageData->GetAoeReduction();
4608  if(mod1)
4609  {
4610  if(!target.PrimaryTarget && aoeReduction)
4611  {
4612  target.Damage1 = (uint16_t)((float)target.Damage1 *
4613  (float)(1.f - (0.01f * aoeReduction)));
4614  }
4615 
4616  if(target.Damage1 == 0)
4617  {
4618  target.Damage1 = 1;
4619  }
4620  }
4621 
4622  if(mod2)
4623  {
4624  if(!target.PrimaryTarget && aoeReduction)
4625  {
4626  target.Damage2 = (uint16_t)((float)target.Damage2 *
4627  (float)(1.f - (0.01f * aoeReduction)));
4628  }
4629 
4630  if(target.Damage2 == 0)
4631  {
4632  target.Damage2 = 1;
4633  }
4634  }
4635 
4636  // If the damage was actually a heal, invert the amount and change the type
4637  if(effectiveHeal)
4638  {
4639  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 * -1;
4640  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 * -1;
4641  target.Damage1Type = (target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC) ?
4642  (isHeal ? DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING : DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN) : target.Damage1Type;
4643  target.Damage2Type = (target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC) ?
4644  (isHeal ? DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING : DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN) : target.Damage2Type;
4645  }
4646  }
4647 
4648  if(skill.IsSuicide)
4649  {
4650  auto selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
4651 
4652  selfTarget->Damage1 = source->GetCoreStats()->GetHP();
4653  selfTarget->Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
4654  }
4655 
4656  return true;
4657 }
4658 
4659 uint8_t SkillManager::GetCritLevel(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
4660  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<
4661  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
4662 {
4663  uint8_t critLevel = 0;
4664 
4665  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false,
4666  target.EntityState);
4667  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true,
4668  source);
4669 
4670  int16_t sourceLuck = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::LUCK, calcState);
4671  int16_t knowledgeCritBoost = (int16_t)(pSkill->KnowledgeRank * 0.5f);
4672  int16_t critValue = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::CRITICAL, calcState);
4673  critValue = (int16_t)(critValue + sourceLuck + knowledgeCritBoost);
4674 
4675  int16_t critFinal = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::FINAL_CRIT_CHANCE,
4676  calcState);
4677  int16_t lbChance = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::LB_CHANCE,
4678  calcState);
4679 
4680  float critRate = 0.f;
4681  if(critValue > 0)
4682  {
4683  int16_t critDef1 = targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
4684  CorrectTbl::CRIT_DEF);
4685  if(sourceLuck < 50)
4686  {
4687  critDef1 = (int16_t)(critDef1 + targetState->GetCorrectTbl(
4688  (size_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK));
4689  }
4690  else if(sourceLuck < 67)
4691  {
4692  critDef1 = (int16_t)(critDef1 + 50);
4693  }
4694  else
4695  {
4696  critDef1 = (int16_t)((float)critDef1 + floor(
4697  (float)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK) *
4698  0.75f));
4699  }
4700 
4701  int16_t critDef2 = (int16_t)(10 + floor(
4702  (float)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::CRIT_DEF) *
4703  0.1f));
4704 
4705  critRate = (float)((floor((float)critValue * 0.2f) *
4706  (1.f + ((float)critValue * 0.01f)) / (float)(critDef1 * critDef2)) *
4707  100.f + (float)critFinal);
4708  }
4709  else
4710  {
4711  critRate = (float)critFinal;
4712  }
4713 
4714  if(critRate > 0.f &&
4715  (critRate >= 100.f || RNG(int16_t, 1, 10000) <= (int16_t)(critRate * 100.f)))
4716  {
4717  critLevel = 1;
4718 
4719  if(lbChance > 0 && RNG(int16_t, 1, 100) <= lbChance)
4720  {
4721  critLevel = 2;
4722  }
4723  }
4724 
4725  return critLevel;
4726 }
4727 
4728 int32_t SkillManager::CalculateDamage_Normal(const std::shared_ptr<
4729  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
4730  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, uint16_t mod,
4731  uint8_t& damageType, uint8_t affinity, float resist, uint8_t critLevel, bool isHeal)
4732 {
4733  int32_t amount = 0;
4734 
4735  if(mod != 0)
4736  {
4737  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
4738  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage();
4739  bool isSimpleDamage = damageData->GetFormula() ==
4740  objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE;
4741 
4742  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
4743  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
4744 
4745  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
4746 
4747  uint16_t off = CalculateOffenseValue(source, target.EntityState, pSkill);
4748 
4749  CorrectTbl boostCorrectType = (CorrectTbl)(affinity + BOOST_OFFSET);
4750 
4751  float boost = (float)(source->GetCorrectValue(boostCorrectType, calcState) * 0.01);
4752  if(boost < -100.f)
4753  {
4754  boost = -100.f;
4755  }
4756  else if(boost != 0.f)
4757  {
4758  // Limit boost based on tokusei or 100% by default
4759  double affinityMax = tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
4760  TokuseiAspectType::AFFINITY_CAP_MAX, calcState);
4761  if((double)(boost - 100.f) > affinityMax)
4762  {
4763  boost = (float)(100.0 + affinityMax);
4764  }
4765  }
4766 
4767  uint16_t def = 0;
4768  uint8_t rateBoostIdx = 0;
4769  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
4770  {
4771  case 0:
4772  case 9:
4773  case 12:
4774  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::PDEF);
4775  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR;
4776  break;
4777  case 1:
4778  case 6:
4779  case 10:
4780  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::PDEF);
4781  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_LNGR;
4782  break;
4783  case 2:
4784  case 7:
4785  case 8:
4786  case 11:
4787  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::MDEF);
4788  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_SPELL;
4789  break;
4790  case 3:
4791  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::MDEF);
4792  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_SUPPORT;
4793  break;
4794  case 5:
4795  default:
4796  break;
4797  }
4798 
4799  // Do not defend against non-combat skills
4800  if(!skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
4801  {
4802  def = 0;
4803  }
4804 
4805  def = (uint16_t)(def + target.GuardModifier);
4806 
4807  float scale = 0.f;
4808  switch(critLevel)
4809  {
4810  case 1: // Critical hit
4811  scale = 1.2f;
4812  break;
4813  case 2: // Limit Break
4814  scale = 1.5f * (float)source->GetCorrectValue(
4815  CorrectTbl::LB_DAMAGE, calcState) * 0.01f;
4816  break;
4817  default: // Normal hit, 80%-99% damage
4818  scale = RNG_DEC(float, 0.8f, 0.99f, 2);
4819  break;
4820  }
4821 
4822  float calc = 0.f;
4823  if(isSimpleDamage)
4824  {
4825  // Simple damage starts with modifier/2
4826  calc = (float)mod * 0.5f;
4827  }
4828  else
4829  {
4830  // Normal damage starts with offense stat * modifier/100
4831  calc = (float)off * ((float)mod * 0.01f);
4832  }
4833 
4834  // Add the expertise modifier
4835  calc = calc + (float)skill.ExpertiseRankBoost * 0.5f;
4836 
4837  // Subtract the enemy defense, unless its a critical or limit break
4838  calc = calc - (float)(critLevel > 0 ? 0 : def);
4839 
4840  if(calc > 0.f)
4841  {
4842  // Get source rate boost and target rate defense boost
4843  int32_t dependencyDealt = 100;
4844  int32_t dependencyTaken = 100;
4845  if(rateBoostIdx != 0)
4846  {
4847  dependencyDealt = (int32_t)calcState->GetCorrectTbl(
4848  (size_t)rateBoostIdx);
4849 
4850  // Apply offset to get defensive value
4851  dependencyTaken = (int32_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)(
4852  rateBoostIdx + ((uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR_TAKEN -
4853  (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR)));
4854  }
4855 
4856  // Include heal if effective heal applies
4857  if(isHeal)
4858  {
4859  dependencyDealt = (int32_t)((double)dependencyDealt *
4860  ((double)calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
4861  CorrectTbl::RATE_HEAL) * 0.01));
4862 
4863  dependencyTaken = (int32_t)((double)dependencyTaken *
4864  ((double)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
4865  CorrectTbl::RATE_HEAL_TAKEN) * 0.01));
4866  }
4867 
4868  // Adjust dependency limits
4869  if(dependencyDealt < 0)
4870  {
4871  dependencyDealt = 0;
4872  }
4873 
4874  if(dependencyTaken < 0)
4875  {
4876  dependencyTaken = 0;
4877  }
4878 
4879  // Get tokusei adjustments
4880  double tokuseiBoost = tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
4881  TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_DEALT, calcState) * 0.01;
4882  double tokuseiReduction = tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
4883  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_TAKEN,
4884  targetState) * -0.01;
4885 
4886  // Scale the current value by the critical, limit break or min to
4887  // max damage factor
4888  calc = calc * scale;
4889 
4890  // Multiply by 100% + -resistance
4891  calc = calc * (1.f + resist * -1.f);
4892 
4893  // Multiply by 100% + boost
4894  calc = calc * (1.f + boost);
4895 
4896  // Multiply by dependency damage dealt %
4897  calc = calc * (float)(dependencyDealt * 0.01);
4898 
4899  // Multiply by dependency damage taken %
4900  calc = calc * (float)(dependencyTaken * 0.01);
4901 
4902  // Multiply by 1 + remaining power boosts/100
4903  calc = calc * (float)(1.0 + tokuseiBoost);
4904 
4905  // Multiply by 100% + -general damage taken
4906  calc = calc * (float)(1.0 + tokuseiReduction);
4907 
4909 
4910  amount = (int32_t)floor(calc);
4911  }
4912 
4913  if(amount < 1)
4914  {
4915  // Apply minimum value of 1
4916  amount = 1;
4917  }
4918 
4919  damageType = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
4920 
4921  if(critLevel == 2)
4922  {
4923  // Apply LB upper limit
4924  int32_t maxLB = (int32_t)(30000 + floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
4925  TokuseiAspectType::LIMIT_BREAK_MAX, calcState)));
4926 
4927  if(amount > maxLB)
4928  {
4929  amount = maxLB;
4930  }
4931  }
4932  else if(amount > 9999)
4933  {
4934  amount = 9999;
4935  }
4936  }
4937 
4938  return amount;
4939 }

5011 bool SkillManager::SetNRA(SkillTargetResult& target, ProcessingSkill& skill)
5012 {
5013  uint8_t resultIdx = GetNRAResult(target, skill, skill.EffectiveAffinity);
5014  switch(resultIdx)
5015  {
5016  case NRA_NULL:
5017  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
5018  {
5019  case 0:
5020  case 1:
5021  case 6:
5022  case 9:
5023  case 10:
5024  case 12:
5025  target.HitNull = 1; // Physical null
5026  break;
5027  default:
5028  target.HitNull = 2; // Magic null
5029  break;
5030  }
5031  target.HitAvoided = true;
5032  return false;
5033  case NRA_REFLECT:
5034  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
5035  {
5036  case 0:
5037  case 1:
5038  case 6:
5039  case 9:
5040  case 10:
5041  case 12:
5042  target.HitReflect = 1; // Physical reflect
5043  break;
5044  default:
5045  target.HitReflect = 2; // Magic reflect
5046  break;
5047  }
5048  target.HitAvoided = true;
5049  return true;
5050  case NRA_ABSORB:
5051  target.HitAbsorb = true;
5052  return false;
5053  default:
5054  return false;
5055  }
5056 }
5057 
5058 uint8_t SkillManager::GetNRAResult(SkillTargetResult& target, ProcessingSkill& skill,
5059  uint8_t effectiveAffinity, bool effectiveOnly)
5060 {
5061  if(!skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
5062  {
5063  // Non-combat skills cannot be NRA'd meaning NRA_HEAL was (apparently)
5064  // never implemented originally
5065  return 0;
5066  }
5067 
5068  std::list<CorrectTbl> affinities;
5069  if(!effectiveOnly)
5070  {
5071  // Calculate affinity checks for physical vs magic and both base and effective
5072  // values if they differ
5073  if(effectiveAffinity != 11)
5074  {
5075  // Gather based on dependency type and base affinity if not almighty
5076  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
5077  {
5078  case 0:
5079  case 1:
5080  case 6:
5081  case 9:
5082  case 10:
5083  case 12:
5084  affinities.push_back(CorrectTbl::NRA_PHYS);
5085  break;
5086  case 2:
5087  case 3:
5088  case 7:
5089  case 8:
5090  case 11:
5091  affinities.push_back(CorrectTbl::NRA_MAGIC);
5092  break;
5093  case 5:
5094  default:
5095  break;
5096  }
5097 
5098  if(skill.BaseAffinity != effectiveAffinity)
5099  {
5100  affinities.push_back((CorrectTbl)(skill.BaseAffinity + NRA_OFFSET));
5101  }
5102  }
5103  }
5104 
5105  affinities.push_back((CorrectTbl)(effectiveAffinity + NRA_OFFSET));
5106 
5107  uint8_t resultIdx = 0;
5108  for(auto nraIdx : target.EntityState->PopNRAShields(affinities))
5109  {
5110  if(nraIdx > resultIdx)
5111  {
5112  resultIdx = nraIdx;
5113  }
5114  }
5115 
5116  if(resultIdx > 0)
5117  {
5118  return resultIdx;
5119  }
5120 
5121  // Check NRA chances
5122  auto calcState = skill.TargetCalcStates[target.EntityState->GetEntityID()];
5123  for(CorrectTbl affinity : affinities)
5124  {
5125  for(auto nraIdx : { NRA_ABSORB, NRA_REFLECT, NRA_NULL })
5126  {
5127  int16_t chance = target.EntityState->GetNRAChance((uint8_t)nraIdx,
5128  affinity, calcState);
5129  if(chance >= 100 || (chance > 0 && RNG(int16_t, 1, 100) <= chance))
5130  {
5131  return (uint8_t)nraIdx;
5132  }
5133  }
5134  }
5135 
5136  return 0;
5137 }
5138 
5139 uint8_t SkillManager::CalculateStatusEffectStack(int8_t minStack, int8_t maxStack) const
5140 {
5141  // Sanity check
5142  if(minStack > maxStack)
5143  {
5144  return 0;
5145  }
5146 
5147  return minStack == maxStack ? (uint8_t)maxStack
5148  : (uint8_t)RNG(uint16_t, (uint16_t)minStack, (uint16_t)maxStack);
5149 }
5150 
5151 std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>> SkillManager::GetItemDrops(
5152  uint32_t enemyType, const std::shared_ptr<objects::Spawn>& spawn,
5153  bool giftMode) const
5154 {
5155  (void)enemyType;
5156 
5157  auto serverDataManager = mServer.lock()->GetServerDataManager();
5158 
5159  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>> drops;
5160  std::list<uint32_t> dropSetIDs;
5161  if(spawn)
5162  {
5163  // Add specific spawn drops, then drop sets
5164  if(giftMode)
5165  {
5166  for(auto drop : spawn->GetGifts())
5167  {
5168  drops.push_back(drop);
5169  }
5170 
5171  for(uint32_t dropSetID : spawn->GetGiftSetIDs())
5172  {
5173  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
5174  }
5175  }
5176  else
5177  {
5178  for(auto drop : spawn->GetDrops())
5179  {
5180  drops.push_back(drop);
5181  }
5182 
5183  for(uint32_t dropSetID : spawn->GetDropSetIDs())
5184  {
5185  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
5186  }
5187 
5188  // Add global drops
5189  const static auto sharedConfig = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
5190  objects::ChannelConfig>(mServer.lock()->GetConfig())
5191  ->GetWorldSharedConfig();
5192 
5193  for(uint32_t dropSetID : sharedConfig->GetGlobalDropSetIDs())
5194  {
5195  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
5196  }
5197  }
5198  }
5199 
5200  // Get drops from drop sets
5201  for(uint32_t dropSetID : dropSetIDs)
5202  {
5203  auto dropSet = serverDataManager->GetDropSetData(dropSetID);
5204  if(dropSet)
5205  {
5206  for(auto drop : dropSet->GetDrops())
5207  {
5208  drops.push_back(drop);
5209  }
5210  }
5211  }
5212 
5213  return drops;
5214 }
