5216 void SkillManager::ScheduleFreeLoot(uint64_t time, const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
5217  const std::list<int32_t>& lootEntityIDs, const std::set<int32_t>& worldCIDs)
5218 {
5219  auto server = mServer.lock();
5220  server->ScheduleWork(time, [](CharacterManager* characterManager,
5221  const std::shared_ptr<Zone> pZone, const std::list<int32_t> pLootEntityIDs,
5222  const std::set<int32_t> pWorldCIDs)
5223  {
5224  auto clients = pZone->GetConnectionList();
5225  for(int32_t lootEntityID : pLootEntityIDs)
5226  {
5227  auto lState = pZone->GetLootBox(lootEntityID);
5228  if(lState)
5229  {
5230  lState->GetEntity()->SetValidLooterIDs(pWorldCIDs);
5231  characterManager->SendLootItemData(clients, lState, true);
5232  }
5233  }
5234 
5235  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(clients);
5236  }, server->GetCharacterManager(), zone, lootEntityIDs, worldCIDs);
5237 }
5238 
5239 void SkillManager::FinalizeSkillExecution(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
5240  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5241  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated)
5242 {
5243  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
5244  activated->GetSourceEntity());
5245  auto zone = source->GetZone();
5246  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5247  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
5248 
5249  auto server = mServer.lock();
5250  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
5251  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
5252 
5253  // Now pay the costs
5254  int32_t hpCost = activated->GetHPCost();
5255  int32_t mpCost = activated->GetMPCost();
5256  bool hpMpCost = hpCost > 0 || mpCost > 0;
5257  if(hpMpCost)
5258  {
5259  source->SetHPMP((int32_t)-hpCost, (int32_t)-mpCost, true);
5260  }
5261 
5262  if(client)
5263  {
5264  if(hpMpCost)
5265  {
5266  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> displayStateModified;
5267  displayStateModified.insert(source);
5268  characterManager->UpdateWorldDisplayState(displayStateModified);
5269 
5270  tokuseiManager->Recalculate(source,
5271  std::set<TokuseiConditionType>
5272  { TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP, TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_MP });
5273  }
5274 
5275  auto itemCosts = activated->GetItemCosts();
5276  uint16_t bulletCost = activated->GetBulletCost();
5277 
5278  int64_t targetItem = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
5279  if(bulletCost > 0)
5280  {
5281  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5282  auto character = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity();
5283  auto bullets = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
5284  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS);
5285  if(bullets)
5286  {
5287  itemCosts[bullets->GetType()] = (uint32_t)bulletCost;
5288  targetItem = state->GetObjectID(bullets.GetUUID());
5289  }
5290  }
5291 
5292  if(itemCosts.size() > 0)
5293  {
5294  characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client, itemCosts, false, targetItem);
5295  }
5296  }
5297 
5298  if(skillData->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() && activated->GetEntityTargeted() && zone)
5299  {
5300  // Start combat if the target exists
5301  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
5302  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
5303  if(target && target->GetFaction() != source->GetFaction())
5304  {
5305  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(true, source, target);
5306  }
5307  }
5308 
5309  bool end = SetSkillCompleteState(pSkill, true);
5310 
5311  // Do not execute or complete toggle skills
5312  bool executeAndComplete = skillData->GetBasic()->GetActivationType() != 4;
5313  if(executeAndComplete)
5314  {
5315  SendExecuteSkill(activated);
5316  }
5317 
5318  if(client && source->GetEntityType() ==
5319  objects::EntityStateObject::EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
5320  {
5321  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
5322  float multiplier = (float)(source->GetCorrectValue(
5323  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE, calcState) * 0.01);
5324 
5325  const static float globalExpertiseBonus = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
5326  objects::ChannelConfig>(mServer.lock()->GetConfig())
5327  ->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetExpertiseBonus();
5328 
5329  multiplier = multiplier * (float)(1.f + globalExpertiseBonus);
5330 
5331  characterManager->UpdateExpertise(client, activated->GetSkillID(),
5332  multiplier);
5333  }
5334 
5335  // Update the execution count and remove and complete it from the entity
5336  // if its at max and not a guard
5337  if(end)
5338  {
5339  if(source->GetActivatedAbility() == activated)
5340  {
5341  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
5342  }
5343 
5344  if(executeAndComplete)
5345  {
5346  SendCompleteSkill(activated, 0);
5347  }
5348  }
5349 
5350  if(client)
5351  {
5352  // Cancel any status effects that expire on skill execution
5353  characterManager->CancelStatusEffects(client, EFFECT_CANCEL_SKILL);
5354  }
5355  else
5356  {
5357  source->CancelStatusEffects(EFFECT_CANCEL_SKILL);
5358  }
5359 }
5360 
5361 bool SkillManager::SetSkillCompleteState(const std::shared_ptr<
5362  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, bool executed)
5363 {
5364  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
5365  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
5366  activated->GetSourceEntity());
5367 
5368  uint64_t currentTime = activated->GetExecutionTime();
5369 
5370  uint8_t execCount = activated->GetExecuteCount();
5371  if(executed)
5372  {
5373  execCount = (uint8_t)(execCount + 1);
5374  activated->SetExecuteCount(execCount);
5375  }
5376 
5377  bool moreUses = execCount < activated->GetMaxUseCount();
5378 
5379  // If the skill was executed, set lockout time and increase
5380  // the execution count
5381  if(executed)
5382  {
5383  auto dischargeData = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge();
5384  uint32_t stiffness = dischargeData->GetStiffness();
5385 
5386  uint64_t lockOutTime = currentTime + (uint64_t)(stiffness * 1000);
5387  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_IMMOBILE, lockOutTime);
5388 
5389  if(source->IsMoving())
5390  {
5391  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()->FixCurrentPosition(source,
5392  lockOutTime, currentTime);
5393  }
5394 
5395  activated->SetLockOutTime(lockOutTime);
5396  }
5397 
5398  // Set the cooldown if no remaining uses are available
5399  uint32_t cdTime = pSkill->Definition->GetCondition()->GetCooldownTime();
5400 
5401  uint64_t cooldownTime = 0;
5402  if(cdTime && (!moreUses || (execCount > 0 && !executed)))
5403  {
5404  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
5405 
5406  cooldownTime = currentTime + (uint64_t)((double)(cdTime * 1000) *
5407  (source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME, calcState) * 0.01));
5408  }
5409 
5410  activated->SetCooldownTime(cooldownTime);
5411 
5412  return !executed || !moreUses;
5413 }
5414 
5415 bool SkillManager::SpecialSkill(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5416  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5417  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5418 {
5419  (void)ctx;
5420  (void)client;
5421 
5422  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5423  if(source->GetSpecialActivations(activated->GetActivationID()) == activated)
5424  {
5425  // Clean up the special activation
5426  source->RemoveSpecialActivations(activated->GetActivationID());
5427  }
5428 
5429  return true;
5430 }

5432 bool SkillManager::Cameo(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5433  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5434  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5435 {
5436  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5437  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5438 
5439  if(!client)
5440  {
5441  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5442  return false;
5443  }
5444 
5445  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5446  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5447  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5448 
5449  if(!cState->Ready() || !cState->IsAlive())
5450  {
5451  SendFailure(activated, client,
5452  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
5453  return false;
5454  }
5455 
5456  // Drop the durability of the equipped ring by 1000 points, fail if we can't
5457  auto item = character->GetEquippedItems(
5458  (size_t)objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_RING).Get();
5459 
5460  auto transformIter = item ? SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.find(item->GetType())
5461  : SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.end();
5462  if(!item || transformIter == SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.end() ||
5463  transformIter->second.size() == 0 || item->GetDurability() < 1000)
5464  {
5465  SendFailure(activated, client,
5466  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ITEM_USE);
5467  return false;
5468  }
5469 
5470  auto server = mServer.lock();
5471  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
5472 
5473  uint32_t effectID = 0;
5474  if(transformIter->second.size() > 1)
5475  {
5476  auto effectIter = transformIter->second.begin();
5477  size_t randomIdx = (size_t)RNG(int32_t, 0,
5478  (int32_t)(transformIter->second.size() - 1));
5479  std::advance(effectIter, randomIdx);
5480 
5481  effectID = *effectIter;
5482  }
5483  else
5484  {
5485  effectID = transformIter->second.front();
5486  }
5487 
5488  AddStatusEffectMap m;
5489  m[effectID] = std::pair<uint8_t, bool>(1, true);
5490 
5491  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
5492  {
5493  cState->AddStatusEffects(m, server->GetDefinitionManager());
5494  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
5495  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> {
5496  TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
5497 
5498  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, item, -1000);
5499  }
5500  else
5501  {
5502  SendFailure(activated, client,
5503  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5504  return false;
5505  }
5506 
5507  return true;
5508 }

5510 bool SkillManager::DCM(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5511  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5512  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5513 {
5514  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5515  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5516 
5517  if(!client)
5518  {
5519  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5520  return false;
5521  }
5522 
5523  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5524  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5525  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5526  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
5527  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
5528 
5529  if(!demon || !demonData)
5530  {
5531  SendFailure(activated, client,
5532  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
5533  return false;
5534  }
5535 
5536  if(!dState->IsAlive())
5537  {
5538  SendFailure(activated, client,
5539  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
5540  return false;
5541  }
5542 
5543  auto server = mServer.lock();
5544  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
5545  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5546 
5547  auto bookData = definitionManager->GetDevilBookData(demon->GetType());
5548  if(!bookData)
5549  {
5550  SendFailure(activated, client,
5551  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5552  return false;
5553  }
5554 
5555  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> removeItems;
5556  removeItems[bookData->GetEntryID()] = 1;
5557  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) && characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client,
5558  removeItems, false, activated->GetActivationObjectID()))
5559  {
5560  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5561  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
5562 
5563  size_t index;
5564  uint8_t shiftVal;
5565  characterManager->ConvertIDToMaskValues((uint16_t)bookData->GetShiftValue(),
5566  index, shiftVal);
5567 
5568  uint8_t currentVal = progress->GetDevilBook(index);
5569  uint8_t newVal = (uint8_t)(currentVal | shiftVal);
5570 
5571  if(newVal != currentVal)
5572  {
5573  progress->SetDevilBook(index, newVal);
5574 
5575  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress, state->GetAccountUID());
5576 
5577  server->GetCharacterManager()->SendDevilBook(client);
5578 
5579  if(dState->UpdateSharedState(character, definitionManager))
5580  {
5581  // If this resulted in an update, recalculate tokusei
5582  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
5583  std::set<int32_t>{ dState->GetEntityID() });
5584  }
5585 
5586  // Always recalculate stats
5587  characterManager->RecalculateStats(dState, client);
5588  }
5589 
5590  return true;
5591  }
5592  else
5593  {
5594  SendFailure(activated, client,
5595  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5596  return false;
5597  }
5598 }
5599

5632 bool SkillManager::FamiliarityUp(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5633  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5634  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5635 {
5636  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5637  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5638 
5639  if(!client)
5640  {
5641  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5642  return false;
5643  }
5644 
5645  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5646  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5647  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5648  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
5649  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
5650 
5651  if(!demon || !demonData)
5652  {
5653  SendFailure(activated, client,
5654  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
5655  return false;
5656  }
5657 
5658  if(!dState->IsAlive())
5659  {
5660  SendFailure(activated, client,
5661  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
5662  return false;
5663  }
5664 
5665  auto server = mServer.lock();
5666  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
5667  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5668  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
5669 
5670  // Present is retrieved after updating the familiarity for an update but
5671  // the skill errors if any present will be given based on the starting
5672  // familiarity level and there is no inventory space open
5673  int8_t rarity;
5674  uint16_t currentVal = demon->GetFamiliarity();
5675  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(currentVal) >= 3 &&
5676  GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(), demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(),
5677  MAX_FAMILIARITY, rarity) != 0 &&
5678  characterManager->GetFreeSlots(client).size() == 0)
5679  {
5680  SendFailure(activated, client,
5681  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::INVENTORY_SPACE);
5682  return false;
5683  }
5684 
5685  // Skills of this type add a "cooldown status effect". If the player character
5686  // already has it, do not allow the skill's usage
5687  auto statusEffects = cState->GetStatusEffects();
5688  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
5689  {
5690  if(statusEffects.find(addStatus->GetStatusID()) != statusEffects.end())
5691  {
5692  SendFailure(activated, client);
5693  return false;
5694  }
5695  }
5696 
5697  int32_t fType = demonData->GetFamiliarity()->GetFamiliarityType();
5698 
5699  if(fType > 16)
5700  {
5701  SendFailure(activated, client);
5702  return false;
5703  }
5704 
5705  // Process the skill without status effects
5706  ctx->ApplyStatusEffects = false;
5707  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
5708  {
5709  SendFailure(activated, client,
5710  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5711  return false;
5712  }
5713 
5714  // Familiarity is adjusted based on the demon's familiarity type
5715  // and if it shares the same alignment with the character
5716  const uint16_t fTypeMap[17][2] =
5717  {
5718  { 50, 25 }, // Type 0
5719  { 4000, 2000 }, // Type 1
5720  { 2000, 1000 }, // Type 2
5721  { 550, 225 }, // Type 3
5722  { 250, 125 }, // Type 4
5723  { 75, 40 }, // Type 5
5724  { 2000, 1500 }, // Type 6
5725  { 500, 375 }, // Type 7
5726  { 250, 180 }, // Type 8
5727  { 100, 75 }, // Type 9
5728  { 50, 38 }, // Type 10
5729  { 10, 10 }, // Type 11
5730  { 2000, 200 }, // Type 12
5731  { 650, 65 }, // Type 13
5732  { 0, 0 }, // Type 14 (invalid)
5733  { 0, 0 }, // Type 15 (invalid)
5734  { 5000, 5000 } // Type 16
5735  };
5736 
5737  bool sameLNC = cState->GetLNCType() == dState->GetLNCType();
5738 
5739  int32_t fPoints = (int32_t)fTypeMap[(size_t)fType][sameLNC ? 0 : 1];
5740  characterManager->UpdateFamiliarity(client, fPoints, true);
5741 
5742  // Apply the status effects
5743  AddStatusEffectMap m;
5744  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
5745  {
5746  uint8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
5747  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
5748  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
5749 
5750  m[addStatus->GetStatusID()] =
5751  std::pair<uint8_t, bool>(stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
5752  }
5753 
5754  if(m.size() > 0)
5755  {
5756  cState->AddStatusEffects(m, definitionManager);
5757  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
5758  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
5759  }
5760 
5761  // Re-pull the present type and give it to the character
5762  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(demon->GetFamiliarity()) >= 3)
5763  {
5764  uint32_t presentType = GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(),
5765  demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(), demon->GetFamiliarity(), rarity);
5766  GiveDemonPresent(client, demon->GetType(), presentType, rarity,
5767  activated->GetSkillID());
5768  }
5769 
5770  return true;
5771 }
5772 
5773 bool SkillManager::FamiliarityUpItem(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5774  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5775  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5776 {
5777  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5778  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5779 
5780  if(!client)
5781  {
5782  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5783  return false;
5784  }
5785 
5786  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5787  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5788  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
5789  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
5790 
5791  if(!demon || !demonData)
5792  {
5793  SendFailure(activated, client,
5794  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
5795  return false;
5796  }
5797 
5798  if(!dState->IsAlive())
5799  {
5800  SendFailure(activated, client,
5801  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
5802  return false;
5803  }
5804 
5805  auto server = mServer.lock();
5806  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5807  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
5808 
5809  auto special = skillData->GetSpecial();
5810 
5811  int32_t maxFamiliarity = special->GetSpecialParams(0);
5812  float deltaPercent = (float)special->GetSpecialParams(1);
5813  int32_t minIncrease = special->GetSpecialParams(2);
5814  int32_t raceRestrict = special->GetSpecialParams(3);
5815 
5816  if(raceRestrict && (int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace() != raceRestrict)
5817  {
5818  SendFailure(activated, client,
5819  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_INCOMPATIBLE);
5820  return false;
5821  }
5822 
5823  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
5824  {
5825  SendFailure(activated, client,
5826  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5827  return false;
5828  }
5829 
5830  uint16_t currentVal = demon->GetFamiliarity();
5831  if(maxFamiliarity > (int32_t)currentVal)
5832  {
5833  int32_t fPoints = 0;
5834  if(maxFamiliarity && deltaPercent)
5835  {
5836  fPoints = (int32_t)ceill(
5837  floorl((float)(maxFamiliarity - currentVal) * deltaPercent * 0.01f) - 1);
5838  }
5839 
5840  if(minIncrease && fPoints < minIncrease)
5841  {
5842  fPoints = minIncrease;
5843  }
5844 
5845  server->GetCharacterManager()->UpdateFamiliarity(client, fPoints, true);
5846  }
5847 
5848  return true;
5849 }

5851 bool SkillManager::ForgetAllExpertiseSkills(
5852  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5853  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5854  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5855 {
5856  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5857  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5858 
5859  if(!client)
5860  {
5861  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5862  return false;
5863  }
5864 
5865  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
5866  {
5867  SendFailure(activated, client,
5868  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5869  return false;
5870  }
5871 
5872  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5873  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5874  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5875 
5876  auto server = mServer.lock();
5877  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5878 
5879  std::set<uint32_t> learnedSkills = character->GetLearnedSkills();
5880 
5881  auto defaultObjs = server->GetDefaultCharacterObjectMap();
5882 
5883  std::set<uint32_t> keepSkills;
5884  for(auto defaultCharObj : defaultObjs["Character"])
5885  {
5886  auto defaultChar = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
5887  objects::Character>(defaultCharObj);
5888  for(uint32_t keepSkill : defaultChar->GetLearnedSkills())
5889  {
5890  keepSkills.insert(keepSkill);
5891  }
5892  }
5893 
5894  uint32_t maxExpertise = (uint32_t)(EXPERTISE_COUNT + CHAIN_EXPERTISE_COUNT);
5895  for(uint32_t i = 0; i < maxExpertise; i++)
5896  {
5897  auto expertData = definitionManager->GetExpertClassData(i);
5898  if(expertData)
5899  {
5900  for(auto classData : expertData->GetClassData())
5901  {
5902  for(auto rankData : classData->GetRankData())
5903  {
5904  for(uint32_t skillID : rankData->GetSkill())
5905  {
5906  if(skillID && keepSkills.find(skillID) == keepSkills.end())
5907  {
5908  learnedSkills.erase(skillID);
5909  }
5910  }
5911  }
5912  }
5913  }
5914  }
5915 
5916  character->SetLearnedSkills(learnedSkills);
5917 
5918  cState->RecalcDisabledSkills(definitionManager);
5919  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
5920  std::set<int32_t>{ cState->GetEntityID() });
5921  server->GetCharacterManager()->RecalculateStats(cState, client);
5922 
5923  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character, state->GetAccountUID());
5924 
5925  return true;
5926 }

5928 bool SkillManager::Mooch(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
5929  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
5930  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5931 {
5932  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
5933  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
5934 
5935  if(!client)
5936  {
5937  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
5938  return false;
5939  }
5940 
5941  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5942  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5943  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5944  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
5945 
5946  if(!demon)
5947  {
5948  SendFailure(activated, client,
5949  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
5950  return false;
5951  }
5952 
5953  auto server = mServer.lock();
5954  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
5955  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5956  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
5957 
5958  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(demon->GetFamiliarity()) < 3)
5959  {
5960  SendFailure(activated, client,
5961  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_FAMILIARITY);
5962  return false;
5963  }
5964 
5965  // Present is retrieved prior to updating the familiarity for a drop
5966  int8_t rarity;
5967  uint16_t familiarity = demon->GetFamiliarity();
5968  uint32_t presentType = GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(),
5969  demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(), familiarity, rarity);
5970 
5971  // If a present will be given and there are no free slots, error the skill
5972  if(presentType == 0)
5973  {
5974  SendFailure(activated, client,
5975  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5976  return false;
5977  }
5978  else if(characterManager->GetFreeSlots(client).size() == 0)
5979  {
5980  SendFailure(activated, client,
5981  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::INVENTORY_SPACE);
5982  return false;
5983  }
5984 
5985  // Skills of this type add a "cooldown status effect". If the player character
5986  // already has it, do not allow the skill's usage
5987  auto statusEffects = cState->GetStatusEffects();
5988  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
5989  {
5990  if(statusEffects.find(addStatus->GetStatusID()) != statusEffects.end())
5991  {
5992  SendFailure(activated, client,
5993  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
5994  return false;
5995  }
5996  }
5997 
5998  // Process the skill without status effects
5999  ctx->ApplyStatusEffects = false;
6000  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
6001  {
6002  SendFailure(activated, client,
6003  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
6004  return false;
6005  }
6006 
6007  server->GetCharacterManager()->UpdateFamiliarity(client, -2000, true);
6008 
6009  // Apply the status effects
6010  AddStatusEffectMap m;
6011  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
6012  {
6013  uint8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
6014  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
6015  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
6016 
6017  m[addStatus->GetStatusID()] =
6018  std::pair<uint8_t, bool>(stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
6019  }
6020 
6021  if(m.size() > 0)
6022  {
6023  cState->AddStatusEffects(m, definitionManager);
6024  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
6025  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
6026  }
6027 
6028  GiveDemonPresent(client, demon->GetType(), presentType, rarity,
6029  activated->GetSkillID());
6030 
6031  return true;
6032 }
6033 
6034 bool SkillManager::Respec(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
6035  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
6036  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
6037 {
6038  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6039  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
6040 
6041  if(!client)
6042  {
6043  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
6044  return false;
6045  }
6046 
6047  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6048  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6049  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6050  auto cs = character->GetCoreStats().Get();
6051 
6052  std::list<int16_t> statVals;
6053  statVals.push_back(cs->GetSTR());
6054  statVals.push_back(cs->GetMAGIC());
6055  statVals.push_back(cs->GetVIT());
6056  statVals.push_back(cs->GetINTEL());
6057  statVals.push_back(cs->GetSPEED());
6058  statVals.push_back(cs->GetLUCK());
6059 
6060  // Loop through each stat and "de-allocate" them
6061  int32_t respecPoints = 0;
6062  for(int16_t stat : statVals)
6063  {
6064  if(stat > 1)
6065  {
6066  int32_t delta = (stat % 10) + 1;
6067  if(stat < 10)
6068  {
6069  delta -= 2;
6070  }
6071 
6072  int32_t sum = (int32_t)(floor(stat / 10) + 1) * delta;
6073  for(int32_t i = (int32_t)floor(stat / 10) - 1; i >= 0; i--)
6074  {
6075  if(i == 0)
6076  {
6077  // Skip the first point
6078  sum += 8;
6079  }
6080  else
6081  {
6082  sum += (i + 1) * 10;
6083  }
6084  }
6085 
6086  respecPoints += sum;
6087  }
6088  }
6089 
6090  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
6091  {
6092  // Reset all stats back to 1 and set the new point value
6093  cs->SetSTR(1);
6094  cs->SetMAGIC(1);
6095  cs->SetVIT(1);
6096  cs->SetINTEL(1);
6097  cs->SetSPEED(1);
6098  cs->SetLUCK(1);
6099 
6100  character->SetPoints(respecPoints + character->GetPoints());
6101 
6102  auto server = mServer.lock();
6103  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
6104 
6105  libcomp::Packet p;
6106  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_RESET_SKILL_POINTS);
6107  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
6108  characterManager->GetEntityStatsPacketData(p, cs, cState, 1);
6109  p.WriteS32Little(respecPoints);
6110 
6111  client->QueuePacket(p);
6112 
6113  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
6114  std::set<int32_t>{ cState->GetEntityID() });
6115  characterManager->RecalculateStats(cState, client);
6116 
6117  client->FlushOutgoing();
6118 
6119  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state->GetAccountUID());
6120  dbChanges->Update(character);
6121  dbChanges->Update(cs);
6122 
6123  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
6124 
6125  return true;
6126  }
6127  else
6128  {
6129  SendFailure(activated, client,
6130  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
6131  return false;
6132  }
6133 }
6134 
6135 bool SkillManager::Rest(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
6136  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
6137  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
6138 {
6139  (void)ctx;
6140  (void)client;
6141 
6142  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6143  // Do not call SpecialSkill as this needs to persist as a special activation
6144 
6145  auto server = mServer.lock();
6146  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6147  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
6148 
6149  source->ExpireStatusTimes(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
6150  if(source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_RESTING))
6151  {
6152  // Expire the status
6153  std::set<uint32_t> expire;
6154  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
6155  {
6156  expire.insert(addStatus->GetStatusID());
6157  }
6158 
6159  source->ExpireStatusEffects(expire);
6160  source->RemoveStatusTimes(STATUS_RESTING);
6161  }
6162  else
6163  {
6164  // Add the status
6165  AddStatusEffectMap m;
6166  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
6167  {
6168  uint8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
6169  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
6170  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
6171 
6172  m[addStatus->GetStatusID()] =
6173  std::pair<uint8_t, bool>(stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
6174  }
6175  source->AddStatusEffects(m, definitionManager);
6176 
6177  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_RESTING, 0);
6178  }
6179 
6180  // Active toggle skill "Rest" only activates and cancels, it never executes
6181  return true;
6182 }

6256 bool SkillManager::Traesto(const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
6257  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
6258  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
6259 {
6260  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6261  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
6262 
6263  if(!client)
6264  {
6265  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
6266  return false;
6267  }
6268 
6269  auto server = mServer.lock();
6270  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6271  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
6272 
6273  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(activated->GetSkillID());
6274 
6275  uint32_t zoneID = 0;
6276  uint32_t spotID = 0;
6277 
6278  uint16_t functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
6279  if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO)
6280  {

6284 
6285  zoneID = character->GetHomepointZone();
6286  spotID = character->GetHomepointSpotID();
6287  }
6288  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[0])
6289  {
6290  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[1];
6291  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[2];
6292  }
6293  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[0])
6294  {
6295  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[1];
6296  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[2];
6297  }
6298  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[0])
6299  {
6300  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[1];
6301  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[2];
6302  }
6303 
6304  if(zoneID == 0 || spotID == 0)
6305  {
6306  SendFailure(activated, client,
6307  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ZONE_INVALID);
6308  return false;
6309  }
6310 
6311  float xCoord = 0.f;
6312  float yCoord = 0.f;
6313  float rot = 0.f;
6314 
6315  auto zoneDef = server->GetServerDataManager()->GetZoneData(zoneID, 0);
6316  uint32_t dynamicMapID = zoneDef ? zoneDef->GetDynamicMapID() : 0;
6317 
6318  if(!zoneDef || !zoneManager->GetSpotPosition(dynamicMapID, spotID, xCoord,
6319  yCoord, rot))
6320  {
6321  SendFailure(activated, client,
6322  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ZONE_INVALID);
6323  return false;
6324  }
6325 
6326  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) && zoneManager->EnterZone(client,
6327  zoneID, zoneDef->GetDynamicMapID(), xCoord, yCoord, rot, true))
6328  {
6329  return true;
6330  }
6331  else
6332  {
6333  SendFailure(activated, client,
6334  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
6335  return false;
6336  }

6392 
6393 uint32_t SkillManager::GetDemonPresent(uint32_t demonType, int8_t level,
6394  uint16_t familiarity, int8_t& rarity) const
6395 {
6396  auto server = mServer.lock();
6397  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
6398 
6399  // Presents are only given for the top 2 ranks
6400  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(familiarity) < 3)
6401  {
6402  return 0;
6403  }
6404 
6405  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6406  auto serverDataManager = server->GetServerDataManager();
6407 
6408  auto demonDef = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demonType);
6409  uint32_t baseType = demonDef ? demonDef->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID() : 0;
6410 
6411  auto baseDef = baseType ? definitionManager->GetDevilData(baseType) : nullptr;
6412 
6413  auto presentDef = baseType
6414  ? serverDataManager->GetDemonPresentData(baseType) : nullptr;
6415  if(baseDef && presentDef)
6416  {
6417  // Attempt to pull presents from rares then uncommons, then commons
6418  std::array<std::list<uint32_t>, 3> presents;
6419  presents[0] = presentDef->GetRareItems();
6420  presents[1] = presentDef->GetUncommonItems();
6421  presents[2] = presentDef->GetCommonItems();
6422 
6423  uint8_t baseLevel = baseDef->GetGrowth()->GetBaseLevel();
6424 
6425  // Rates for uncommons and rares start at 0% at base level and increase
6426  // to a maximum of 25% and 15% respectively up to max level
6427  double rng = 0.0;
6428  double rateSum = 0.0;
6429  for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
6430  {
6431  bool useSet = false;
6432  if(i == 2)
6433  {
6434  // If we get to the common set, use by default
6435  useSet = true;
6436  }
6437  else if(level - baseLevel > 0)
6438  {
6439  uint8_t minLevel = 0;
6440  double maxRate = 0.0;
6441  if(i == 0)
6442  {
6443  // Rare set
6444  minLevel = (uint8_t)(baseLevel + ceil((100.0 - (double)baseLevel) / 5.0));
6445  maxRate = 15.0;
6446  }
6447  else
6448  {
6449  // Uncommon set
6450  minLevel = (uint8_t)(baseLevel + ceil((100.0 - (double)baseLevel) / 10.0));
6451  maxRate = 25.0;
6452  }
6453 
6454  if(minLevel <= (uint8_t)level)
6455  {
6456  double rate = (((double)(level - minLevel) + 1.0) /
6457  (100.0 - (double)minLevel) * maxRate) + rateSum;
6458 
6459  if(rate > 0.0)
6460  {
6461  if(rng == 0.0)
6462  {
6463  rng = (double)RNG(uint16_t, 1, 10000) * 0.01;
6464  }
6465 
6466  if(rng <= rate)
6467  {
6468  useSet = true;
6469  }
6470  }
6471 
6472  // Don't run RNG multiple times (not getting a rare technically
6473  // increases your odds of getting an uncommon)
6474  rateSum += rate;
6475  }
6476  }
6477 
6478  // Use an even distribution between all items in the same set
6479  if(useSet && presents[i].size() > 0)
6480  {
6481  rarity = (int8_t)(2 - i);
6482  if(presents[i].size() == 1)
6483  {
6484  return presents[i].front();
6485  }
6486  else
6487  {
6488  auto it = presents[i].begin();
6489 
6490  size_t randomIdx = (size_t)RNG(int32_t, 0,
6491  (int32_t)(presents[i].size() - 1));
6492  std::advance(it, randomIdx);
6493 
6494  return *it;
6495  }
6496  }
6497  }
6498  }
6499 
6500  return 0;
6501 }

6503 void SkillManager::GiveDemonPresent(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client,
6504  uint32_t demonType, uint32_t itemType, int8_t rarity, uint32_t skillID)
6505 {
6506  if(!client || itemType == 0)
6507  {
6508  return;
6509  }
6510 
6511  auto characterManager = mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager();
6512 
6513  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> items;
6514  items[itemType] = 1;
6515 
6516  if(characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client, items, true))
6517  {
6518  libcomp::Packet p;
6519  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_PRESENT);
6520  p.WriteU32Little(itemType);
6521  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)rarity);
6522  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
6523  p.WriteU32Little(demonType);
6524 
6525  client->SendPacket(p);
6526  }
6527 }

6529 void SkillManager::SendActivateSkill(std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated)
6530 {
6531  // Instant executions are not technically activated
6532  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
6533  {
6534  return;
6535  }
6536 
6537  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6538  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
6539  auto zConnections = zone
6540  ? zone->GetConnectionList() : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
6541  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
6542  {
6543  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
6544 
6545  libcomp::Packet p;
6546  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_ACTIVATED);
6547  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
6548  p.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillID());
6549  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
6550 
6551  timeMap[11] = activated->GetChargedTime();
6552  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
6553 
6554  p.WriteU8(activated->GetMaxUseCount());
6555  p.WriteU8(2); //Unknown
6556 
6557  p.WriteFloat(activated->GetChargeMoveSpeed());
6558  p.WriteFloat(activated->GetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed());
6559 
6560  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
6561  }
6562 }
6563 
6564 void SkillManager::SendExecuteSkill(std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated)
6565 {
6566  // Instant executions use a special packet to execute
6567  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
6568  {
6569  SendExecuteSkillInstant(activated, 0);
6570  return;
6571  }
6572 
6573  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6574  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
6575  auto zConnections = zone
6576  ? zone->GetConnectionList() : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
6577  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
6578  {
6579  int32_t targetedEntityID = activated->GetEntityTargeted()
6580  ? (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID()
6581  : source->GetEntityID();
6582 
6583  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
6584 
6585  libcomp::Packet p;
6586  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_EXECUTED);
6587  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
6588  p.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillID());
6589  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
6590  p.WriteS32Little(targetedEntityID);
6591 
6592  timeMap[15] = activated->GetCooldownTime();
6593  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
6594  timeMap[19] = activated->GetLockOutTime();
6595  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
6596 
6597  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetHPCost());
6598  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetMPCost());
6599  p.WriteU8(0); //Unknown
6600  p.WriteFloat(0); //Unknown
6601  p.WriteFloat(0); //Unknown
6602  p.WriteFloat(0); //Unknown
6603  p.WriteFloat(0); //Unknown
6604  p.WriteFloat(0); //Unknown
6605  p.WriteU8(0); //Unknown
6606  p.WriteU8(0xFF); //Unknown
6607 
6608  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
6609  }
6610 }
6611 
6612 void SkillManager::SendExecuteSkillInstant(std::shared_ptr<
6613  objects::ActivatedAbility> activated, uint8_t errorCode)
6614 {
6615  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6616  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
6617  auto zConnections = zone
6618  ? zone->GetConnectionList() : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
6619  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
6620  {
6621  int32_t targetedEntityID = activated->GetEntityTargeted()
6622  ? (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID()
6623  : source->GetEntityID();
6624 
6625  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
6626 
6627  libcomp::Packet p;
6628  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_EXECUTED_INSTANT);
6629  p.WriteU8(errorCode);
6630  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
6631  p.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillID());
6632  p.WriteS32Little(targetedEntityID);
6633 
6634  uint64_t cooldown = errorCode == 0 ? activated->GetCooldownTime() : 0;
6635  timeMap[p.Size()] = cooldown;
6636  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
6637 
6638  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetHPCost());
6639  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetMPCost());
6640 
6641  if(cooldown)
6642  {
6643  // Relative times are only needed if a cooldown is set
6644  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
6645  }
6646  else
6647  {
6648  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
6649  }
6650  }
6651 }
6652 
6653 void SkillManager::SendCompleteSkill(std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
6654  uint8_t mode)
6655 {
6656  // Instant executions are not completed as they are not technically activated
6657  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
6658  {
6659  return;
6660  }
6661 
6662  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
6663  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
6664  auto zConnections = zone
6665  ? zone->GetConnectionList() : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
6666  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
6667  {
6668  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
6669 
6670  libcomp::Packet p;
6671  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_COMPLETED);
6672  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
6673  p.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillID());
6674  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
6675 
6676  // Write the cooldown time if cancelling in case its set (mostly for multi-use skills)
6677  uint64_t cooldown = mode == 1 ? activated->GetCooldownTime() : 0;
6678  timeMap[p.Size()] = cooldown;
6679  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
6680 
6681  p.WriteU8(1); // Unknown, always the same
6682  p.WriteFloat(source->GetMovementSpeed());
6683  p.WriteU8(mode);
6684 
6685  if(cooldown)
6686  {
6687  // Relative times are only needed if a cooldown is set
6688  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
6689  }
6690  else
6691  {
6692  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
6693  }
6694  }
6695 }
